lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam?

lines.name: MAX
lines.text: Hey everyone! It's me, Sam Riegel, the wackiest guy in D&D, to tell you about D&D Beyond! I love D&D Beyond because it helps me organize my character, Nott the Brave, so I can concentrate on being zany and doing Nott's voice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do the voice, Sam! You're so good at it!

lines.name: MAX
lines.text: (as Nott, but badly) Pip pip cheerio! Mystery solved! Roar! Buttons!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was really good.

lines.name: MAX
lines.text: Anyway, being wacky Sam Riegel means I get to tell you that Waterdeep: Dragon Heist is now available on dndbeyond.com and will guide your Waterdeep campaigns from level one to five. For levels five to 20, explore the legendary undermountain dungeon below the city with Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage, which is available for preorder and will release on November 2nd. And you guys--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (shouting) What the fuck is going on?! What-- Max?! Are you in my seat?! Go away! Go! What the fuck is happening?! Travis, you emailed me. You said we were starting at 7:15 tonight. Did you lie to me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No! Yes. Okay, look. Listen, man. It's nothing personal, it's just last week's spot was a little rough, and we needed to have a safe, non-offensive spot this week.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And you thought no one could tell the difference between me and Max?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Honestly, I'm still not sure which of you is Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm Sam!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you Max?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm offended at this, guys. My spots are not controversial in any way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah? Did you write something for tonight?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I do. I have it on my phone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did it involve fart sounds? Offensive stereotypes? Cursing? Violence? Inappropriate uses of pickles and/or cucumbers?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It might have. Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can't be trusted, dude. Listen. Read what we wrote for you there. It's a hundred percent safe, non-offensive. The jokes are approved, so go ahead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fine. (clears throat) It's me, Sam Riegel, the wackiest guy in D&D, telling you to head on over to D&D Beyond, where their new content is like anti-gravity; it's impossible to put down. On D&D Beyond, my username is "benefits." That way, if you add me to your party, it'll say we're friends with benefits. No, seriously though, my username is "forrestgump," and my password is "1forrest1."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Even better coming out of your mouth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you write this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Come on. Wrap it up. Let's go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was great, Max.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I liked long-haired Sam.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we switch him after the intro?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a cantrip. Thank you, D&D Beyond. Thank you, Sax. Mam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm Sam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're Mam. Smax. I like that. We'll go with that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Max did really good at getting through that, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And our secondary sponsor tonight, returning from last week, our friends at Raven and the Rook have their Kickstarter up for their awesome, fantastic Far Traveler's Collection notebooks for you to keep all of your campaign notes in. All of the leather is engraved, and you have all the different sheets for your character spell information and everything else. The quality is pretty badass, actually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just have the one. That's good, because you can keep adding paper to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can add paper once you write too big, like you do? Nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't write too big.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Comparatively.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't have only four words on this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tickets are still available at Ticketmaster. You can check out more information-- pardon me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you just burp?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those who were here earlier in the week saw that our Twitch subs are now live! We have a bunch of new content releasing now and will be releasing soon. We announced a few new shows that are going to be coming up very soon, actually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Monday!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, do you want to talk about that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Foster, where he talks about how storytellers became storytellers, and he's starting with Taliesin, and he teaches you how to make a cocktail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was really good, Marisha. Are you really Marisha?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're wearing sleeves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. I don't believe it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (gasps) It's a lie! Shank!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got her! I took care of her!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good. Thank you, Travis. Good looking out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if I morphed, though? You weren't supposed to know!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Species level tears him in half. Anyway, Between the Sheets! Mondays on our Twitch channel! Beginning with interviews with the cast of Critical Role, and from there, expanding out into different friends of the show and beyond. We'll have a lot of great perspectives and people of different backgrounds and ideas. It's going to be a really fun show. We also announced the upcoming show for All Work, No Play, for these two handsome gentlemen here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Us? We have a show again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm so happy!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One a year.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We hold hands the whole time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Look for information on that and all our upcoming content at critrole.com. We're also raising money for Sam's favorite charity.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, the Pablove Foundation raises money to battle childhood cancer, and we're supporting Blair Herter on his ride from San Francisco to Los Angeles. We've raised over $64,000, maybe more by now. I haven't checked in a little while. We're trying to get to $100,000, and if we do, we will get to unlock me doing a Fireside Chat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you going to be naked for it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does go to the charity.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keep giving!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, guys, for being amazing and supportive of this fantastic charity push. More to come! As part of that, we are announcing that the special one-shot is-- it's on my list here. Do you want to talk about it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're doing a one-shot of Crash Pandas. I'll be running the game with some of the people at this very table, and it's going to be released on the 28th of September. I think?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 21st.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 21st of September! It's live on the 21st of September!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 7pm on this channel. Next Friday the 21st.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got to write this thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You better get on that, buddy! The VOD will be available on Sunday at youtube.com/criticalrole. Look for that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Crash Pandas, of course, done by the same guy, Grant Howitt, who did Honey Heist. You can download all of his games for free. Search his Patreon and support him, because he makes free games for people. That's a nice thing to do with your life.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Life goals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, I believe our announcements are complete. Without further ado, let's jump into tonight's episode of Critical Role! [click, TV static] [groovy Critical Role theme]

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Taliesin! Double guns!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Long game, motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You made your way through the Wuyun Gorge, purchased a few pets, and then eventually found yourselves-- for many of you, your first time-- at the beach, at the coast, seeing an ocean, seeing the waves, seeing the sand, and took a brief bit of time to relish in that experience. Eventually making your way to Nicodranas in time for the sunset across the western ocean. You began to notice the workforce that goes through the day and dwindles to the night that works alongside the numerous number of ships that come in and then stay along the wharf and the various docks in the vicinity. You made your way through the-- not very stealthy. But we're not in character yet, so I'll allow it. You made your way throughout various districts of the city, eventually meeting the fantastic and long-presented mother of Jester: The Ruby of the Sea, Marion Lavorre. After having some time to catch up with her, exchange information about your travels, you discovered that there had been some issues with one client of hers in the town, and managed to gather a little bit of information, but began to seek more about this Algar, this figure who had grown jealous of other clientele and seemed to be becoming a point of concern for Marion. You took it upon yourselves to look into this individual, and find a way to possibly resolve this while you were in town. You also began to run into some other curious mysteries. You went to the lighthouse and spoke with the lighthouse keeper there for a bit. You had found a strange tower in the Open Quay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucked up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Then eventually discovered, along the wharf, a tavern with a familiar name based on some of the previous things you were keeping an eye out for: the Wayfarer's Cove. You had just stepped into the darkened interior of this, the smell of old, wet wood combined with the dried liquors and ales that had long stained the various tables and floorboards of this dank and relatively musty bar. Looking across the clientele, a few interesting persons caught your attention, and that's where we left off. So, Mighty Nein, as you begin to enter this darkened, torch-lit interior-- lantern, I would say, slowly hanging from various portions of the ceiling, crossbeams, the bits of wind that push them, causing them to slightly shift and have this shifting crackle of firelight within the chamber, what do you wish to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've never seen a-- I mean, I've seen one, but I've never spoken to a--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Turtle person?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Pretty cool-looking. I don't think I've ever actually saw one, either. I've only seen pictures.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that an eye patch?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are those tattoos?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that a shell?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should we talk to him first?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Who wants to talk to-- no? Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! That looks crazy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are those things coming out of the shell? Green tubes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you a turtle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you walk up and approach him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm a shithead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're all going to fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, what you asking, eh?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you-- did somebody shoot it out of your eye?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well t-that's certainly a possibility, cher."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't remember?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You don't think that perhaps someone's going to tell you their life story just without "even knowing you? You can buy me a drink first."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, I will buy you a drink if you tell me how your eyeball went missing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ask him what he wants.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What-- oh do you not want milk? Do you want something else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(sighs)" He raises one of his fingers up towards the bar and the bartender glances up. "Oh another round, okay." He turns around and begins preparing what looks to be another drink. Lowers his hand and claw which scrapes across the wood and leaves this little curl of-- little shaving that is put to the side as his hand comes to rest, looking back at you with his one eye. "How about this then? Let's trade a story, huh?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Y-you tell me where you're from and why it brought you in to my table, then m-maybe I'll tell you how I lost this, yeah?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm the daughter of the Ruby of the Sea. Do you work for any government officials?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(laughs) No."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you know these are my friends and we've gotten into a lot of hijinks and um... what all did you want to know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Drink gets brought down to the table. "Don't worry, she's going to take care of it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Do you have money to take care of it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two milks, one hot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a silver for that so it's an easy trade off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We order anything other than milk please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, well for a round of drinks and the milks involved as well, that'll put you we'll say at about... two silver.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's also possible that we met my dad earlier and we didn't know it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm going to be perfectly honest: that was a lot m-more than I was asking. But I appreciate it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I appreciate you too. How did you get those pipes on your back? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He turns and you hear the creaking of leather as the long extended neck turns, the folds of skin pushing against themselves. "Oh this? Got this here on sea maybe about... six or seven years ago."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh boy. (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do they do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He reaches back and you can see-- it's interesting because on the right side of the shell it looks like elements have been carved through where these pipes have been put in on the back. On the front there's a small deflated pouch of leather and a small extended tube of metal. He lifts it with one hand and breathes into it and it inflates a bit and inflates a bit. You see his one eye look around mischievously to everyone else at the bar and goes, "I mean y-you asked." (terrible bagpipe wails) This trio of bagpipes begin blasting out of these large, almost shell-sculpted pipes that curve out of his shell and everyone in the room just immediately starts grabbing their ears going "Ah!" and start throwing things over, clanking off of his shell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is happening? I don't know anymore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's so good! That was good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: entertained."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Entertained. Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a very good skill, you're quite talented. Really.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's your typical rank on board ship if you don't mind me asking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's been a number of m-m-months since I found me a good ship and a purpose out there on "the ocean sea, but I've been known to be a rather decent second mate and navigator."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is your name Marius?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's not my m-m-moniker." (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is your name, friend?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Orly."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Orly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Orly Skiffback."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Orly Skid--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Skiffback."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You better skip back!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now, I've been forthcoming in my d-direct title. M-m-might I ask what your individual names "may be?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well of course. My name is Fjord.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'm Beau.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb Widogast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Junior.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nancy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Welcome to this shithole." He grabs his drink and sips. Takes a few moments and looks around again. "Y'all still lingering for some reason?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You say it's been a few months since your last passage on a ship. Steady work?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did he slip into it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did I?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You started sliding-- (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (grunts) Stay away! Stay away! Southern accent! Trying to Texas, Georgia, Louisiana! (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just go on a little walkabout.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're looking for an individual that might frequent these parts. Half-elf gentleman. You seen anyone named Sabian in these parts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can't say that I have there son, my apologies. However you're m-m-more than welcome to "ask around. I'm sure there's a whole mighty spectrum of curious travelers that come in and out "of here."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you not been on a ship because of a lack of opportunity, or if the right situation presented itself you would be perhaps up for a bit of work?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "More the latter than the former. I got to jive with the right crew. More like they got to "jive with me. I mean--" and he does this I'm-a-fucking-tortle physicality to it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's the bagpipes, isn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, they're an acquired taste I'd say perhaps, cherie."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Judging by your physique though you must be quite excellent on the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, I'd say so."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sure you're an asset to any vessel. Now that I've buttered you up-- how about-- have you ever heard of Marius LePual?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why you asking?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If I m-might inquire."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well as one green to another, we were just told that he might be around and he has some information that we were looking for. We are actually trying to deliver him a bit of correspondence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh that will go over great. Ooh! Minus three... oh no. Persuasion is at zero? How did that happen? Anyway it's 13.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're proficient.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh I'm proficient at persuasion. Wow, who knew?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Occasionally the boy has needed a place to crash "and I've provided my shack, my abode, when he's been drinking too hard or comes in with some sort "of a m-mark on his face."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're roommates with Marius?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Only in occasionally."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you seen him lately?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "N-not in a few days, no."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know where he went?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't pay attention, don't care none."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you frequent spots outside of this particular establishment or is this your shithole of choice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see him getting guarded the more you start asking about Marius a little bit. Caduceus, you specifically, as you're watching this, you get the sense that he's offered up a little bit of information but that little bit seems to have caused him to reel in. He's being guarded and doesn't seem very forthcoming, though he passes it off as a lack of information.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I apologize if we're anxious. We just want to get our business concluded as quickly as possible and move on to more pressing matters. I mean, if you see Marius or know that he's around, you're welcome to tell him that people are trying to deliver something. I get the impression that he's a friend and I also get the impression that he's probably used to a fair bit of trouble and we're hoping not to be trouble.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You said something about a delivery?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well it's complicated, I'm not even going to pretend that I entirely understand it myself. We're--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a present. It was a present for him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a shifting to Orly at which point the last of the air in the small pouch gets pushed in and it (wailing bagpipes) slowly comes to rest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Again I hate to ask personal questions but--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (makes farting sound with chair) (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bastard. Have you ever sailed with Marius by any chance? I mean, do you have an impression of him as a sailor or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Waiting on something to be delivered. Never found its way around. Was getting real-- that boy owes a "lot of money."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll have to say that we might be the answer he's looking for. We're removed from the actual situation. We're more delivery by happenstance more than anything else. We have our own questions and problems and concerns which can only be answered by someone who has a better grasp of the situation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking talking cow over here. It was great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know people. And turtles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow. Persuasion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21? Orly looks you straight with his one good eye, glances up and down. You get a good look. The leather eye patch itself has its own carving into it like it was wettened at one point and then shaved to have a very similar pattern as the curling wave tattoos that match his upper arms and you can now see the backs and sides of his neck. Looking through you for a moment, goes--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sometimes he's meeting folks in ships and selling things I can only imagine is illegal. Sometimes "he's picking things up."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You wouldn't mind me asking for a brief description of him so we can identify him when we see him? That would be most advantageous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tiny little fuzz.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Super cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "With a big old flop of blonde hair, hangs around in front of the face."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's pretty cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Other than that, he don't dress m-m-mighty rich or anything. Tends to stay out of sight, so "maybe be best you keep a keen eye around the shadows, huh?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure. I imagine he's probably a little jumpy of people if he owes money and that sort of thing. That can make someone very mistrusting. I would hate to invoke your name in front of him, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If all goes well and you end up doing him a solid, don't be afraid to tell him that Orly put you in the right direction, huh?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thanks, friend, that's great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If not, don't say a fucking word."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, of course not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scratches the bottom of the chin, looking at you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This tortle must survive at all costs. Are we in agreement?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tell us a story, Orly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The other folks in the tavern-- there are only five? Four or five?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's the woman.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's the white-haired lady.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Crotchety half-elf bartender

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The thick elf, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And the other fisherman person?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there's an older fisherman-looking gentleman who's sitting there, minding his own business, staring at his own drink, though now he's glaring over this large group that's conversing after blowing bagpipes in the middle of his previously solitary afternoon. There's a woman, probably late 40s, early 50s or so, with a very big mass of hair that goes from a dark brown, to a gray, to white at the tips, almost like a mane. Dark skin, looks weathered from lots of travel and probably seen quite a bit in her day. A light brown coat that hangs over the edge of the chair she's sitting in. They're all looking at you guys because you all come storming in here, cause this ruckus, talking to the tortle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a dog that's peeing on shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you guys aren't the most subtle of arrivals.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is she giving us a quizzical look, a suspicious look, an interested look?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That sucks balls. Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hard to tell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Don't know if I care. I'm going to go over to her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you guys stay with Orly, or--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I mean, is Orly giving the vibe that he is enjoying the company or giving the vibe that he now wants to enjoy his drink in peace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks like he is enjoying his drink and he's not giving you any particular vibe in your direction. He doesn't seem to mind, but he's not engaging. Most of his conversation is reactive at the moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we got one more problem we got to deal with, which is your mom's problem.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's the one where we're going to maybe have to get a little difficult.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To refresh everyone else's memory, because my memory is sound, we're looking for a way to get down into the underbelly of the city, right?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: The Sluice Weave.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just called the Sluice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, that's right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's where the guy that's causing the problem is, but it seems super complicated.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got to find out some info.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Do you know anyone who knows how to get down to the Sluice Weave, or has ever been there, by any chance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What are you talking about?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't actually know what I'm talking about, to be fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't either, my apologies. I don't know."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Insight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Use those blue dice, those blue dice!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I touched them all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You did. That's a natural one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's smiling with his response, and in all your time, you're not very well versed in the tics and the subtle facial reads for tortles.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whispering) I like tortles. Yeah, we've got somebody who's a bit of a problem we have to deal with as well. This is a completely separate issue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, that's fine. There are all sorts of problems throughout this city. You end up taking "one down, that's one m-m-more that we don't got to piss on."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's somebody being impolite to a friend of ours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My mom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, that just ain't going to stand now, is it, cherie? You got to respect people's m-m-mamas."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While you're having this conversation, Fjord has walked over to the other table and the woman sitting there, her hands resting on the side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm trailing him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trailing as well?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep, trailing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys approach, with Fjord towards the front, she watches you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Couldn't help but notice we seemed to have caught your eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I'm going to be honest. It's hard not to draw my attention with that very subtle display you've all managed to provide."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I apologize. Clearly my friends and I are new in town, and we are very inquisitive. What is that you're drinking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This here? Wine."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispering) Am I slipping? I can't help it! I can't not do it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's so dapper in here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's wine. Red. Why, you buying?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, would you care for more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(chuckle) I'll always care for more."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll wave to the barkeep to bring another round over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For just her or for both of you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That'll put you back, we'll say--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 200 gold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Most expensive wine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, we'll say one silver for just her, for one round.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you wouldn't mind, we were moving through the town, and there is this tower right in the middle of it. The Tide Peak, I believe it's called in my notes. Can you tell me, do you know anything about that? Such a strange structure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To be completely honest, I don't spend a lot of time in the Quay. I tend to focus more on "this side. The business is better." I don't know why I'm focused on that other eye. I'm stuck in that. I just noticed that. No, it's good. She was leaning this way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've had your Creole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, and it's a problem already. She goes, "I've seen it. I've certainly gazed and seen "that weird tower. I think that's what you're referring to."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you live in these parts, or are you just passing through?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh no, just passing through. Taking a break. I've only been here for about a week, and "then shoving off back to this trade route towards Marquet, probably."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, a fellow sailor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You a sailor as well?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed. Not for some time, I'm a bit out of practice, but yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What's your specialty? I might be looking for crew."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I'm quite a strong back. Good with rigging, topsail. You name it, I've done it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What's your rank?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I didn't quite make it up past making the crew. I'm afraid higher duty didn't quite suit me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But you're looking to travel?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could be. Do you have work?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I maybe got room for one more in the crew if you want to come along. Prove yourself a few days at sea."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I might stop by. Where is your ship?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She glances off to the side and points on the far left side of the harbor. "I can't really "show you from here. Follow me." She steps up and walks past you towards the front and points to one ship. "Past there, the one with the grayish sails furled up. That's the Drensala Vis. That's my ship."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Drensala Vis. Your ship? Beautiful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She's been through a lot, but she's stuck with me for many years."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Apologies, did we catch your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I didn't catch yours."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, my name is Caleb Widogast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who is this guy?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb Widogast, and this is my friend Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This your friend?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very intelligent, good with books and numbers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've got to say, I'm pretty intrigued by a strong-backed, small-ranked sailor looking for "work that walks around with his own accountant."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well. not specifically to Fjord, but to our group. We are an odd bunch, a collection of people, so you know, we tend to get our noses in things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know how valuable it is to be a jack of all trades. I've tried some things in the meantime while I've been landlocked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When we need to crunch numbers, we have me, and we have others as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Caleb Widogast."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fjord. Just Fjord?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I'm just Captain Adella. Pleasure to meet you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The pleasure is all ours. When are you planning to cast off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think when we round up with a full crew and supplies gathered up. Probably want to take "some time to relax here in town for another week or so and then we'll head off. It's probably going "to be a good six, seven months' journey before we come back. But if you and your accountant friend "are looking to come, we got room for two more."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two only? Do you have room for-- well, it's just six right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you want to pay passage."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is certainly possible. You are heading back to Marquet, you say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, direct. Couple stops along the coast, but--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll keep it in mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was nice meeting you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You as well."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh also, I'm sorry, if I could round back for a moment to that tower. I know you don't know much, but it sounds like you've been here longer than we have. Have you heard anything about it? It's so odd.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's about as much as I've heard. I tend not to poke around places that act weird, strange "magics and such. Lot of folks that get too curious end up not coming back."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Agreed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And now she's older! She's got the salt and pepper hair! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was waiting for a fluorescent light to turn on. No, it was good, you were engaged.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wasn't she the one that I asked if she was a pirate, right? She was like, "The fuck?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we sailed with her. Vox Machina sailed with her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just curious, you don't happen to have any members of your crew by the name of Sabian, do you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She goes, "Not in my crew."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The name sound familiar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Haven't seen him since, though.".

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cadmus, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Cadmus Leeland. You know Cadmus Leeland?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The name rings a bell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's a right fuckface, I'll tell you that."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A few months, you say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Capnis or Cadmus?

lines.name: MATT, LIAM, SAM
lines.text: Cadmus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does the name ring a bell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a history check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why does it sound familiar?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It does sound familiar.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because it's a dope-ass name. Oh, that's better. 18!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have heard of Cadmus. Cadmus goes under the guise of a shipping merchant that hops from port to port, but for those who work heavily in the shipping lanes, he's known to be a thief, one that skims off the top. Recently, his business has come to a crawl as he's instead been staying out to sea, possibly, from what rumors have said, been involved in the shaking down of ships without means of protecting themselves.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Motherfucking pirates

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's a pirate. Fucking pirates!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also, with that roll, you know the name of his ship: The Widow's Embrace.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Widow's Embrace

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That also sounds familiar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do we know that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because it's another good name.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, do you have a memory of this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, have I ever heard of this boat in all my readings?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not in your readings, no. You haven't spent a lot of time studying maritime history.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why is it so familiar?! (whispering) Widow's Embrace, Widow's Embrace, Widow's Embrace.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was this recently? When would I have written--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have we heard this name before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't think you have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just a good name. Fuck. Damn you and your good name and character creation. Slow it down, man. Fucking us up over here. Giving us alternate dimensions and shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why, what's this Sabian to you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: An old friend of mine. I owe him some money. If you happen to see him, let him know that Fjord was looking for him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, but I'd do my best to stay away from Cadmus. The guy's a right asshole. If your "friend's palling around with him, I don't know what kind of shit your friend's getting into these days."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I'm sure it's nothing too savory. He's had terrible judgement in the past.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, Captain Adella looks over your shoulder a bit and goes, "Anyway, I'm going "to go finish my wine. It's been a pleasure."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll turn over my shoulder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ashley, if you want to jump in here, if you don't mind?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Surprise!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cue heavy metal music!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (mimicking heavy metal music)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where did those flash pots come from?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh hi!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: HI!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Completion! The full set!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Revoke your travel status! Never leave again! Okay, cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, I know. Hi!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys spin around to see the broad shoulders and intimidating presence of Yasha step into the dark bar interior. Yasha, you step inside looking for a moment of respite and a drink and are caught off guard by the group that is now staring back at you with the same aghast expression.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, fuck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, fuck!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll run over and give her a big hug on her knees!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, hello everyone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are the odds? Pretty slim.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What are the odds?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like we should talk. Let's get this back corner booth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you doing here?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm just passing through here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you know we were here? Did you get our message? Did you get my messages?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No. You sent messages?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I sent you lots of messages, Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What did they say?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, they said that we were--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can summarize it; it'd be fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They mostly said that I missed you and that we were going to Nicodranas and we were heading over to find out more stuff about-- I don't remember what we're even doing here in Nicodranas anymore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're here for Fjord and also for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're here for Fjord and we're finding out stuff about him and also we saw my mom.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, we've never seen the ocean.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I've never seen the ocean either, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you see it now? Because we're here in the city. It's right over there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just got here a bit ago. I've been--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you okay?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are you doing here?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I am trying to get in the water. I need to go somewhere.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the water?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm trying to find passage to go somewhere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go somewhere where?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (sighs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't have to tell us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, she has to tell us. Where're you going now? You just got here. We haven't even said hello!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. I've been on a journey and I have somewhere to go. At least, I think that I need to go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Immediately? You need to get on a boat?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Not immediately.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Today, tomorrow, or--?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We can have a drink or two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could we get a couple bottles of wine over here, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bartender goes and gathers a couple bottles of wine. That'll run you-- fair or fine wine?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fine wine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll be, for two bottles, 20 gold.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, I've changed my mind. The price on that--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's getting the cork.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give me the Two Buck Chuck, please.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: PBR?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For a passing, somewhat briny wine, run you about two gold for two bottles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll buy. It's been a while.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For the basic bitch wine, correct?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I'm not going to pay for a nice glass of wine for your ass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is Yasha. You can't afford--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's fine. I can't tell the difference.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was talking to Caleb. I'd buy a glass of wine for you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank you, Beau.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You may be in luck. We just met a captain of a ship, not two minutes before you walked in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Technically only has one spot on her boat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's going to Marquet. Is that where you're going?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't exactly know where I'm going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That will be difficult to find.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you're on a journey of immediate agency, and you're not sure where you're going, and you think you have to go, but you're not sure?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She might be under a spell or something, a hypnosis spell. Hit her. Snap her out of it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I just--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're feeling a calling?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. I had dreams of a place that I need to go to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's it look like?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we've been there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They're islands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) My dad is from islands! At least he was. Did you know my dad might be The Gentleman?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You mean--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that happened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The moist guy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The guy that sweats all the time?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Has all our blood.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) That's why I'm blue!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Jester!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's probable. It has not been verified.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So your mom's the Ruby of the Sea, and then The Gentleman.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Potentially. I mean, it could've happened.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's a pretty interesting man. I wish I could've met your mother.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's right here. You can meet her if you want to. I told her all about you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You did?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have to go punk some guy's ass who's been harassing her. If you want to join us on kicking this guy's ass, and then we can report back to her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's in the sack?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just some stuff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Someone's head? Is it a body? It's a body, isn't it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it presents for us? Have you been gathering presents for when you saw us again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, are you super-goth Santa or something?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have so many questions.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Who's this guy that's been messing with your mom?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's this really creepy guy who was trying to get with her, and she's like, "I don't know," and then he's like, "You're only going to be mine!" She's like, "I don't like that," and now he's threatening everybody else that wants to see her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you know, your standard angry creeper.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That sounds like someone whose ass I would like to kick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: His name's Algar? Algar Dyomin? Have you heard of him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea who that is.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have no idea who that is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But he has a douchebag sounding name, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, that sounds-- I don't even remember it. Algar? Al Gore?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh no. I'm still struck by the fact that you have walked into this tavern where we are. It means something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's fate!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is what I'm saying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's the Traveler.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe it brings us all together. Maybe it's special in some way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sisterhood of the Traveling Dodecahedron.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gross.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seriously though, are you okay after everything? We didn't really leave on the most positive of terms.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll be okay. I've had to work through some things. Speaking of, it looks like you have a new member already in the group.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we're not replacing Molly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You were in your own space.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We didn't really get to explain. You were the last to wake up of the three of us, and by the time you came around, we had met Mr. Clay. He apparently worked in a graveyard? Cemetery? I want to get it right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja. He was crucial in us getting the three of you out.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, thank you. I'm sure we could've made it if we had more time. But thank you for helping.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, here you are.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, here I am.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think, perhaps it's destiny. Do you believe in destiny?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But you dream about islands, and you go to them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fucking shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He does this a lot, Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know if I like you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know I like you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go with it! Open up, and he'll read into your inner thoughts. That's his power.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You should try some of his dead tea. It's pretty good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Your dead tea? What is a dead tea?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like it sounds.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What is it? Does it taste good? I'm not opposed to such things. I have a fine palate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let me see you eat a meal, then I'll figure out what tea to give you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh. Okay. Sounds like a plan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How did the vision of these islands come to you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, they come in my dreams, as most of my visions have. It's the way that I commune with the Stormlord, and-- I don't know. I'm trying to find some purpose for all this, I guess.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Stormlord?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I mean, the purpose of all--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You commune with the Stormlord? The Stormlord?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: At least, I think I am.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's significant.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't have any dreams at night, you guys. Is that worrisome?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You probably do, but you just don't remember them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that the deal?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can sleep with crystals to have a more vivid experience when you dream.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep a dream journal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think that's true. Oh, dream journals I think are true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tonight, when it looks like you're really fast asleep, I'll wake you up and ask you what you're thinking about!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, deal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I suppose if the Stormlord put you on this path, then you're with us now because of some divine intervention. I think it's important to follow one's feelings on such things. I commend you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What was your name again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Caduceus, Caduceus Clay. It's a pleasure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Caduceus Clay. That's a very interesting name.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you, they've been-- your friends have spoken very highly of you in your absence.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's very nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have missed you; we don't mean to pry.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I've missed you guys too, but, sometimes it's just best to go my own way sometimes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, by all reality, we barely know each other.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is funny how you keep showing up though, like a bad penny.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Isn't it weird?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I never understood that penny.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a weasel! Here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, no! Okay, that's-- oh, wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His name is Sprinkle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sorry, Sprinkle.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where did you get-- whoa!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Interact with that fucking weasel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see this bright crimson weasel that is now curled up in your hand and (chattering).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's not trained yet. Don't lose him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It pisses right in your hand.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's, uh, that's okay. This is Sprinkle?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mmm.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a very cute little thing. I don't want to crush it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a dog too.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: There's a dog?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As soon as the animals come out, I go to talk to the barkeep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the animals are apparently marking you as their territory. But you see this tiny, light brown puppy with big oversized paws and a couple of faint stripes across the fur, these pointy, fey-featured elements, more angular than a softer puppy should, and these eyes look up at you (panting).

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Aww. I do like dogs very much. This is very cute. Who's this--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, sorry.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What's his name?

lines.name: SAM, LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Nugget.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nugget.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if we teach Nugget to also be able to bamf to Yasha while she's gone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know it's been a long time, but her name is Yasha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It has been a long time, Yasha. Then maybe Nugget can go back and forth between us when we're away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To Yasha?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can he blink that far? I mean, when I blink, I blink only ten feet. Believe me, I wanted to go farther, and I just kept blinking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From the bar: it seems very doubtful. Excuse me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But how cool would that be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The somewhat portly half-elf greets you as you approach again. "All right, would you like "another drink?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, I'm still working on the first one, but I love your establishment--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, why wait, it's good to have a backup, right?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja. I will take a backup, you are correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, very well."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While you're pouring, I had a question for you. My friends and I, we have just rolled into town, and while we were walking through, we noticed this very strange tower here. It's so bizarre, what is that place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, what? The big blue tower over in the Quay?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That grows and shrinks when you walk toward and away from it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tide Peak.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't know the name. Just being casual, you know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I yell over, Oh now you're interested in the tower!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I ignore her like usual.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, I know of it, yeah. Why? Why do you ask?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, it's just that it changed-- oh, thank you-- it's just that it changed proportions the closer we got or further away from it, it didn't seem natural.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, it's got some weird sort of illusion magic to it. It's creepy."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whose is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Belongs to some mage. He's been here for a while; named Yussa."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it, he's a mystery to the city, I suppose?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A mystery to me, I don't fucking go and start climbing up towers to ask questions where "they don't belong."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have to be a jackass to climb a tower like that, it's just ripe full of danger.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stay on task, Widogast! Just quoting your own advice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's, um--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's, you know, a crass idiot. Don't mind her. But--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shouting) Can I get another wine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Same or--?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's right next to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This close. Good job, asshole!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes and prepares-- looking at this, "Would you prefer a pitcher?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Beau, we need to get going. We need to find Algar.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's midday. This guy's like, "Fucking money tourists."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, thank you for your time. He pours his glass out on the ground out of the bartender's view.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The fuck, what's wrong with you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Subtle. Thank you very much for your time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shouting) That was my shoe, asshole!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're yelling at me from across the bar.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You just established that I was next to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not in a German accent, Marisha.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everyone, please. Yasha has to catch an express bus out of here, so we should probably get to ass-kicking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't believe you didn't get my messages!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where did you send them to?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To your brain!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, the magical messages. They should have arrived. That doesn't make any sense, unless if you were under someone's spell?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or sleeping, perhaps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well I guess I could have sent them while you were sleeping, I guess.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did I get any messages?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thinking back, you had received these words, but not having a lot of experience with this type of spell contact before, you weren't sure if it was you imagining things or having a slight nervous breakdown.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I didn't get any--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I need to be more specific with my messages. You know, and I never got to say, "You "can reply to this." That's an important part of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that's four extra words.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, speaking from experience, sometimes when you're very focused on a task, it can create a blind spot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sad trombone noise)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there something we can throw? Hold on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the worst shit that's ever been said on this show.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stay on task, Widogast! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do we find Al Gore-- Algar? Shit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do we find Algar?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have asked everyone in this bar about everyone else in this town except for Al Gore. I don't think that we have, no. We have not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We asked about the Sluice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The tower. We've asked about Sabian. We've asked about Marquet. We've asked about the Marius guy. We need to ask why we came here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We asked Orly about the Sluice, and he said he didn't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott, why don't you get up on a table and get everyone's attention and ask the room if they know anything about Algar?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or the Sluice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, they already know we're all here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I take a big swig of booze, stand up on the table, take off my mask.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everybody, your attention please! (claps)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone curls over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (shouting) Everyone in the Wayfarer's Cove!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this a good place for Thaumaturgy? Fuck it, let's accent this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're surrounded by a band of goblins! They're everywhere! And they'll come in here unless you tell me the location of Algar! Tell me now! And I kick over a chair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The chair falls over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two kicks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It finds its way to the ground. There's a pause as everyone looks around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's goblins everywhere! They're banging at the windows!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I use Thaumaturgy to bang the windows!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is totally the diner scene in Pulp Fiction now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe add his last name, Dyomin?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Every fucking last one of you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You might know him as Mr. Dyomin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a continued pause as they all look around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Free round for anybody who has any information.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doing a pass across everybody in this room, with a discerning eye, especially with your Passive Insight, you get the sense that nobody here really knows this Algar figure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've threatened them with goblin tactics!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was, of course, a scene from the one-act play that you can see later tonight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Over at the fancy-- I forget the place that I'm from. The fancy place.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Marquis Demesne.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Lavish Chateau.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Lavish Chateau!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love that monologue.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are you guys doing a play?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Orly is clapping with his giant, mitt-like, clawed tortle hands. "Not too bad!" (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Also we have to remember: tonight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Midnight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Head to the docks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To talk to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Marius.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: LePual.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First question to Marius: how do you pronounce your last name?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. That's going to be a really important one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, do we want to go by the Sluice Weave? Or is that going to be way too shifty?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't just go to the Sluice Weave, it's underwater.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but there are gates.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And they said we could get in trouble if we go there uninvited.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So how do we get invited?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, it couldn't hurt to do a drive-by and just see if we could see anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See what kind of paperwork? Or identification?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought the gates were underwater?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought they were, too. I thought the entrance was underwater.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what you were told from the light keeper at the lighthouse. She said as far as she knew the entrances that she knows of are beneath the docks. Where the land falls off and meets the ocean and the docks are out there, it's somewhere underwater there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go and see if we can see something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I mean do we swim?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How?

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, yeah, everybody can swim...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we take a rowboat? And I'll just stay above the surface and when you guys are ready, tug and I'll pull you up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you strong enough to pull us up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yasha will stay with me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yasha can swim, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yasha and I want to kick douchebag ass together. It's been so long.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll hold your hand underwater, Nott.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you want to ride on my back? I am a very good swimmer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's true, you could piggyback.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like a dolphin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't understand. We're just going to go out into the harbor and start swimming blindly looking for an underwater gate?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got to start somewhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we send someone first, or at least ask around before we just start swimming?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe ask a few more questions in a few other places besides dive bars.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean you can't live at the Sluice, right? He's got to leave it at some point, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but I mean at least if we're heading towards the docks where the entrances are, I'm sure more people in that area will know--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go to the docks!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You're not that far away, thankfully. You've been hanging around the Restless Wharf for a while, which is where the tavern was. Striking out towards the edge and looking across the docks, there's one large ship that came in and looks like a lot of stuff is being unloaded and is busy on that end. Not that far off of it, the next dock that shoots out and turns to the right, there looks like there's a couple of anchored ships there. It's a little less busy, looks like they're currently moored there and not a lot of folks are doing business on or around the ships, other than just keeping a watch on the docks themselves.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should I secure us a rowboat?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that something you can do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pretty sure I can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a ship shack, or something that would lease vessels?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's an official term, guys. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see anything in the way of a ship shack right now. You do see a man. An older, grizzled fisherman of some kind, or at least a dock worker. He has this long cap on that dangles past his mid-shoulders, in a heavy dark gray cloth shirt that is drenched with sweat like he's been doing hard work throughout most of the day. You see him currently tying a small rowboat to the edge there and holding it in place.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Old timer! I'm sorry to bother you, I don't see a mariner's office around here. Is that your rowboat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh yeah, this here is my boat. What's your name, sir?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fjord. Jimmy."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jimmy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Pleasure to meet you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You much of a shipman yourself?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Little bit, little bit, my friends here were hoping to explore the coast a bit. And if I could put some coin in your pocket, I was wondering if you would mind parting with your vessel here for a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say, because you have a sailor's background at this point, you guys converse back and forth a bit. You swap some stories with him about how he used to be a dockworker, and some of the ships he was on back in the day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tales of the worst greenhorns you've ever worked with.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When you're done, bring it back."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is most kind of you, we are much obliged.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Least I could do." He goes ahead and helps untie the boat. You have it at your disposal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it big enough for all of us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it big enough for all of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try. Comfortably it can fit four people. Uncomfortably it could fit you all space-wise, you're uncertain as to the ship's ability to hold the load.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott, why don't we just pull you along since you have your water-walking ring? It would be like skiing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, that's not a terrible idea. I was going to volunteer to be pulled by--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I weigh less than Yasha's sword. So if you want to save some weight--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true, Yasha could put the ring on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, but I would have to take it off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then you'd ride in the boat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Surrounded by water in the ocean.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have we been led to the boat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's tied up to the dock.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is going to take a while.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caleb seems very comfortable. Since it only fits a few folks, I--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll stay on the shore, it's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, you have to come with. I was going to volunteer to trail behind; the armor helps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe I should too, because, you know, I'm watery now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's right!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am blue and that's the same color as the sea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to get a little smaller so that I take up less space in the boat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? You get smaller? What do you mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to turn into a shaggy-looking half-elf, literally probably look a bit like Shaggy from Scooby-doo.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that a Disguise Self thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does it change your physical weight and stuff?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think it changes your weight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't change his weight, but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can get several feet shorter. It's a firbolg thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it is a firbolg thing! Well, fuck, that's awesome!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can seem up to three feet shorter, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, seem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, volumetrically it wouldn't make that much of a difference for you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I did it anyway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think you'll be fine, actually, if Jester and I are trailing behind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How is Jester going to trail behind? Because her dad has sweaty palms?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Some people aren't scared of the water, Nott. It's actually quite safe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They are wrong. It's horrifying! There's monsters in it, you can't see down below, it can snuff you out in a few moments.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've just described every environment that life can manifest in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look, Nott. And I reach down into the water and touch it with my hand. There is absolutely noth-- (yells). I just fall right into the water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord just disappears beneath the surface.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just churning bubbles and stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not worth it, let's go!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I pop back up. See? Totally fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was it that got you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You'll never know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is the sea.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, I've--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's pretty, huh?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It is very pretty. Actually, I've been looking at it already. At night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, so you were lying.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, well, I just didn't want to tell you guys everything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you been here a few days already?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Been here for three days.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's longer than us! How did you know we were coming?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I didn't know you were coming.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we calling dibs on the boat?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe-- this is the closest ocean that I knew. Maybe your message did get across, Jester, and I did hear it somewhere in the corner of my brain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get in the water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, somebody's got to ask if anybody has any idea where the entrance to the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I saw it, if I recall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The entrance?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She pointed it out, didn't she? When we were--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She pointed a basic direction, but there was no visual guide to it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll feel confident in my knowledge, that's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go ask your sailor friend, Fjord!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm in the water with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, get back out and go ask him where the Sluice is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You come out, dripping, the water slowly pouring out from under your armor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Woo! Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm covered in armor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's still wet!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Price of a good joke, I'm afraid. Are you knowledgeable about the entrance to the Sluice Cove? Sluice Weave?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've heard of that, but I don't really know much about that, sorry."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good luck, though."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was he telling the truth?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, he was telling the truth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do you know?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because I know sailors.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you sure about that? A guy who works at the docks in the harbor where this thing is wouldn't know the location of everything under the water?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why don't you threaten him with a trove of goblins around the wharf while--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would have worked if someone had been a little snappier with the Thaumaturgy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's my fault, I'm sorry! I yell from the water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there anyone else on the docks? Anyone else that we can see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. There's a handful of other people that are in the process of-- Largely on the other side where that bigger ship is that's being currently unloaded or loaded into-- you can't tell from this distance.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any crownsguard-- or I'm going to say zol-eezzo?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Zolezzo.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Zolezzo, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are. You can see two zolezzo that are just patrolling the docks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With all this dicking about, how long would you guestimate I've been muttering in the boat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten minutes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten minutes, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey Beau!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know those people skills we've been working on?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, pretty good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to ask the zolezzo if they mind telling some tourists about the fabled entrance to the Sluice Weave?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay. (sighs) All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, my story, just so, you know, I can really commit to this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, good, yeah. Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm a tourist.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm still Beau, right? I'm Beauregard the tourist.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're going to use your real name?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should I not use my real name?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Try something else.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm Julia! From--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't look like a Julia.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am Leslie.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tracy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tracy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
