lines.text: Totally Tracy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I look like a Tracy-- okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I'm Tracy, from Zadash!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (Valley girl voice) And, you know, my parents are paying for just a little bit of a spring break so that I can, like, go find myself before I go into college, right? Before I go to uni.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know this person, don't you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this a thing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is somebody you've met.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (normal voice) I'm trying to figure it out. Because if I'm just me, I'm just going to be an asshole. So I have to be somebody else.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is very observant. Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So-- and I heard about this mysterious Sluice entrance. This Sluice thing like--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want me to do this, yeah? So I should take my hair--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, here. I'll just use this side, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Give it the old-- Yeah! Fierce.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that good? Does that work?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Do I find the most insecure-looking guy and then use that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like it, go with it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, I go to the most insecure-looking guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a general insight check to try and gauge which of them is the most insecure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Insecurity check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's not bad!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's not bad at all!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You look, and of the two that are there, one of them seems to be pretty preoccupied with the ships that are being loaded. And one of them appears to be half-present, probably in mid-daydream, yawning at his post, and looks younger than the other one. Between the two of them, he's probably the most insecure, if you had to decide.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (Valley girl voice) Oh gosh, isn't the water just so beautiful? Man, it's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, can I help you?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I-- (sighs) What's your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, I am working at the moment--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh great, because I could totally use some help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see his eyes roll and he goes, "What can I do to help you, then?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, you see, I'm from out of town-- I'm Tracy, by the way. What's your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He sighs heavily and reaches out and finally takes the hand. He goes, "Hello, I am Zolezzo Merpol."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Merpol, hi. It's just, you know, I'm here and I'm trying to get the true Nicodranas experience while I'm in town and, you know, I just, I've heard rumors from people, you know, about this thing called the Sluice Weave. And you know, I would just love to see it, see if it's real, you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love imagining Beau in the outfit that she's in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Freaking wraps on her arms.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bruises on her arms.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A fucking stick up the back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Old busted lip scars.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Although, to be fair, I've seen this many times at St. Patrick's Day parades in New York--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (slurred) Excuse me, officer?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, baby.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm too dumb to be a risk, right? Too vapid to be a hazard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "Oh, that is a very specific curiosity."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm into curiosities. I'm a curious person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, the Sluice Weave is a series of tunnels that were installed probably a century ago "that are responsible for-- They are ducts that guide water from the ocean to a series of small "engines in the city that help propel the furnaces that the various businesses and locations here "that require that sort of intense power to utilize. It's also--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow! I hear they're haunted. Are they haunted?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, not haunted, per se. But there are--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you gave me a little smirk. They're totally haunted! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "Not haunted, but there are elements to it--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I give him a little (giggle).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "There also-- There are things that help maintain the Sluice ducts, and occasionally "help protect elements of the bay if ever it's under attack."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I bet you're first in line to protect the city against an attack, aren't you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sheepishly) "I mean, there's been-- You know. About a year ago they had this one ship that "came into the-- There were these thieves-- And I happened to be on job at the moment and so-- yeah!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow! So interesting. So, have you been down there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I haven't been down in the Sluice area, there. The entrance, as far as I know, is mostly "hidden, the one inside the city."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, so there's one inside the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Somewhere, I don't know."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh wow. I heard there was one in the ocean!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, there's two or three, I think, that are right down off the side-- Here, come here." And he leads you over.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're all just aghast. Just like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn to Fjord and I go (gagging sound).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) He leads you over across the dock for a bit. And he points down in the water and goes, "I think somewhere in this vicinity there is sort of the intake tube or pipe, where the ocean "water is brought in to the Sluice ducts."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sounds like it's got a lot of suction in the intake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god. This cake needs more layers, girl!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Perception? Is that what you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From this distance it's too hard to see beneath the water. It gets a little too murky. But he points in a general direction and you get a loose idea of where it may be.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow, yeah. Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's like, "So what are you up to while you're in the city?" (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, just trying to fill my schedule with things. I should probably go now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course! Where are you staying?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (forced giggling) I'm staying at the Lavish Chateau!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, wow! That is a very expensive place."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know. You probably couldn't afford it, so--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see the visible (pained grunt) to his chest. He's like, "Well, perhaps I'll-- If you "want other things to see around the city when I'm not on my post, I could maybe come by and give you "a little tour?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure, that sounds great!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. What are you doing right now? I only have about 40 minutes until I get to switch "my shift, and then I'm off for the rest of the afternoon."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (forced giggling)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is everything I wanted.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is so painful, I feel like I should make a concentration check on my spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know. I'm actually doing a quick little boat tour, just right over there. But I'll be right back, okay byeee! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks a bit flabbergasted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just over there. I'll be right back! Just-- (giggle)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "See you later! What was it? What was the name? Tracy?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tracy! What was your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He sits there for a second and goes "Tracy--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh wait, your name is Marisol--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Merpol.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Porpal? Marpol?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Merpol.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Merpol! Merpol?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't write that down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (heavy breathing) That was--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait. Wouldn't it be funny if that was Marius?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, no. Different name. He thinks to himself, "Tracy." And continues the rest of his post along the dockside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I need a shower.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where did that come from?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That it's there. It's maybe always been there. And then I had to-- (deep breath) Let's go. I don't want to talk about that anymore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She lives inside of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who the fuck is Tracy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, what are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm casting Find Familiar and I'm changing Frumpkin's shape.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Into a--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Octopus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: An octopus?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's come true!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys all begin to gather into the boat, the two of you, I think you said you're staying off to the side? Jester and Fjord?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're getting into the water and we'll just either hold on to the back, or if we have rope on the dock, I'll just tie four foot--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there's extra rope available. So you guys swim beneath as it continues off through the water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As we're untying the boat-- Right? It's tied up? As we're untying the boat, I'm going to hide behind a pillar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we see her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll find out. Roll a stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nott the Brave, are you coming with us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, I was just checking the rigging.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, I saved a seat up by me and Frumpkin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. I'm coming.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'll be all right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have Frumpkin slither his way onto Nott's back and do a cozy hug from behind over the shoulder. Not on the head.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like Clarota. Like (brain-sucking sound).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, because that's weird. So just over the shoulder, and then the tentacles tickle her face and stuff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And that's not weird?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the joke.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't worry, Nott. If you fall over the side, Fjord and I will catch you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're literally back here as a safety net, so don't fret.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beau? Point us in the direction that your boyfriend alluded to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck you, man. It's over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys begin to row over in that direction. Who all is keeping an eye in the water?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and make a perception check, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I assist by throwing Frumpkin into the water and looking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure! So go ahead and take advantage on that, between you and Frumpkin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Poor Frumpkin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Glancing through the water, you watch as one of the sun rays definitely hits a clear patch of the ocean below you. And you see a brief glimmer of what looks to be a either metal or stone piece that is different from the rest of the natural, slightly eroded rock. You see a circle, maybe a four- or five-foot-wide opening that's about 40 feet down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Frumpkin, go take a look at that, if you wouldn't mind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin, go take a look at that, if you wouldn't mind. (splash sound) Down towards it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I have my hand on Nott's shoulder, doing that thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Elements of it are blocking the front, but you can clearly see there is a dark tunnel that continues into the earth, beneath the city, beneath the docks. You don't know how far it goes, necessarily.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do Frumpkin and I see anything alive or moving down here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pretty good. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not see anything alive or moving in this vicinity. Best you can see, the tunnel continues in for about 15 or so feet, and there is a metal grate. You can see eight or so bars across. Actually, about ten bars, about an inch thick each, and they're horizontal, though it's a little bit tilted to one side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far apart are each of the bars?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With eight of them and it's about four and a half, five feet across. Sorry, ten across. It would be about six inches between each.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think my octopus could probably squeeze through that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, your octopus could.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (plopping sound)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you saying what you see?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, are the bars rusted? Did they seem rusted at all?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did they seem rusted?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can still see the metal. You can see a little bit of rust here and there. Looks like more natural elements seem to have crusted and clustered around parts of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to urge Frumpkin on further, to see what we can see. Frumpkin has dark vision.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About-- Let's see here. About 60 or so feet into the tunnel, it curves upward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 60 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 40 feet down, 60 feet into the tunnel, and then up, still underwater.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Up he goes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. About 30 or so feet up, the water breaks. There's a surface, though there is no light. Does Frumpkin's octopus form have darkvision?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Darkvision, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Okay. So does Frumpkin--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, crests up and pokes his eye nubs out of the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Frumpkin floats there on top for a second, and you can see now where it emerges--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Looking for anything moving here, while we're up here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is another set of bars right at the top of that tunnel, that Frumpkin has pushed and squeezed through to come through. So there's bars, like a grate, on the way in, and then a grate once you curve upward into the tunnel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So he's come through a second set.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And now you can see, it is closed off mostly, except for a tunnel that continues deeper in the same direction that the lower tunnel went. And that one continues on for a bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Muttering all this as it happens.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there any air between the water and the grate?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no air between the water and the grate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is all water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's all water up, and then there's the grate, and then it turns into this tunnel that continues inward, and there's about a foot of water beyond that, and then there's air from that point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to speed him back to the first grate, and have him took for the locking mechanism if there is one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check for Frumpkin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you have Knock. That's right. Fuck yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's investigation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doesn't work underwater.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or through an octopus. That's a 14.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true, if you can't speak, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14? You can still mutter the incantation underwater.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gurgling)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think you said last campaign that you can hold the air for one spell, possibly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, in the process of casting a spell, if you're holding your breath, that's your breath.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (garbled) Go fuck yourself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the way to do it. Looking, there is no locking mechanism. The grate isn't one that opens and closes. it's not a door, it's just in place.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. So he will swirl away and go back to the second and do the same look around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: While he's doing that, can I pop my head underwater and look around, just make sure there's no-- anything coming around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The second grate also appears to not have a locking or unlocking mechanism; they aren't meant to be removed, it seems, in a casual way. They seem to be placed there intentionally for an indefinite period of time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. All right, buddy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's beautiful. You can see the colors and glistening bits of silver as the fish curl through the sunlight, but nothing catches your attention as dangerous in your immediate vicinity, thankfully.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Could I look to see if anyone's watching us out on the shore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: Go Yasha. Go Yasha, go!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't think I actually see anything. I think I forgot my glasses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I rolled a seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You look out and people seem to be working on the dock and, you know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're safe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sending him forward. And I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you're sending him further in?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Past-- you said it goes now straight that way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once you go past this-- You can look past where this pillar is, the chamber seems to close off and another tunnel continues on, almost like this is just a waypoint chamber. On the right side, you see a much smaller grate: maybe a foot and a half, two feet across, with a more dense cross-lattice of bars.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not able for Frumpkin to squeeze through that, I'm guessing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Frumpkin's size? How big of an octopus is Frumpkin? An octopus, I'd say it would be about that big.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm imagining I am not summoning a gigantic octopus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But octopuses can squeeze through some pretty small spaces. Yeah, so I'd say make an athletics check for tiny octopus Frumpkin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And that would be strength-based, yeah? Because it doesn't say on his thing. That is a nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Frumpkin gets partially through but the nature of the lattice and Frumpkin's unfamiliarity with the octopus form reaches a point where it can't quite get all the way through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's true! It's only his second time. Okay buddy, forget that. Back it up. Is there anything unique about the pillar down here or is it just basic stonework?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks like basic stonework, it has a slight curvature to it but it's probably placed in here either as a load bearing piece since this is beneath a heavier city or-- It doesn't look remarkable or have any other purpose beyond just being a support pillar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are Frumpkin and I able to tell if this goes water all the way to the ceiling of this chamber or is it water with air above? Or it's all water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The water only goes up to a foot, and then it's air for the rest of it. It's about ten or so feet tall, the chamber.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Is there anything out of the ordinary if he pokes his head up out of the water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Getting bored sitting in the water out here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! It's every lovely we should just stay here all day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No guys, no better adventure then having all your friends sit back and send your tiny friend.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You could always punch the wizard in the head at any time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, exactly! No, I know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey Yasha, let's go try to break through that grate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Occasionally, you see slight waves, little ripples from different directions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you guys want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get him back here and let's try to get through that grate!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are there any like buttons or key holes in any of the grates?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He looked through Frumpkin's eyes and there was nothing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't hear any of you, so tap me if you want me to keep going: one time tap me or two times if you want me to pull Frumpkin out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I flick him in the back of the head three times.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I said one or two, I don't know what that means.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll gently tap you twice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are we doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Based on that description I want to see if I can figure out what buildings would be directly underneath, do my own mental map of what has been described.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh dear.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 40 down, 40 across, 30 up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make an intelligence check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's probably a little over 100 feet beyond where you are now, though you are probably in the boat about 15 or 20 feet back. So it's about 125, 130 feet. Which you couldn't-- because it's 100 foot range for to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pull him back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To pull him back yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I would tell him then to swim back. If we, in our game, are allowing connection as long as it's not broken, I would just tell him to come back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, cool. So you are fine. Best you can tell over there it looks like some sort of warehouse. It's a larger storage building, it's not remarkable in its design or decor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe that thing is, maybe directly on top of what you were looking at.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think that's a great idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: However, if you wanted to test your strength I would be very careful! Remember it was an intake, so you could get down there and all of a sudden the suction and the water would make it very difficult for you to back out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well Frumpkin wasn't getting sucked in, was he?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It could turn on, turn off.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm okay with unpredictable.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I could also if we want to hang a little longer I can just send him. You know I don't want him to be squished but I can send him as far as he can go to see what he hits. It's up to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! I want to go try to break through the grate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, who is going down?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The strongs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll hold a rope.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can you keep him down there just to watch us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, of course. Frumpkin is now like a backpack on Yasha's back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tentacles wrap over the shoulders and underneath.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold on to Spr-- Oh! I can't do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm afraid you are going to eat my weasel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! I had a lot of seagulls yesterday for dinner, I'm very full still.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You promise me you won't eat him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That really sounds like a euphemism.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah it does.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will not eat your weasel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about the damn puppy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The puppy is in the boat like (panting, barks).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't eat the puppy either. Promise.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Too bony.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Promise?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Too bony. Promise.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You promised me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I promise I will not eat your weasel today.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beau's holding onto a lead line.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Big breath. (deep inhale)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The three of you dive down. Which one of you has the lead line?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who has the other end of it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord has it. You guys all dive down, taking a breath, pushing through the seaweed until eventually you come to the base of where that tube is. A few feet into it, you see the grate, and it's about roughly four and a half, five-foot diameter so you have to crouch down, but you can get a hold on this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, let's get a hand on it and brace our feet against the tunnel and on the count of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. One of you roll with advantage or you both roll independently.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was a practice count! What'd he say?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you want to roll? He said roll with advantage or roll independently.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's roll independently.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is a strength check?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While they're rolling, I grab Nott's shoulder and turn on the Jacques Cousteau camera on Yasha's back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Not a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but 20 total?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the DC you needed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you both are holding on and pulling. You get your foot in some of the imperfect stonework where elements of the masonry pokes out which gives you a foot groove and one part where some of the stone had been rotted away and that's just enough of a point to lock yourself in. As you pull, you feel (shifting) and eventually it comes out of its mooring on the wall and then slides off to the side. You rotate it a bit and it comes to rest in the middle of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That is the coolest!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (pointedly humming)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys go ahead and come back onto it again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm keeping an eye out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did not think that was going to work.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I didn't either, but it's open.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: At least one of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Amazing!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's really strong.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, here's my other question, though: can we hold our breath that long?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did it seem like it was hard to hold our breath while we were doing all of that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you guys all have pretty high constitutions, so not really.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should we try the other one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's try the other one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It works out, just so you guys know, your constitution modifier is how many minutes you can hold your breath underwater.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: David Blaine up in this bitch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm all right, too. That's cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Make a summer home underwater.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My constitution must be low, mine's three.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My swim speed is my regular speed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Our swim speed is half?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, technically, it's one plus your constitution modifier, so it's even more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, nice! Okay, we try to go to the second one and break through. Okay, so this time, I'll be more specific. I'll go hm, hm, hm, and then we pull it! Yeah, one, two, three, pull!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're pulling down right after three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. One, two, three, pull!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you guys are going to go down and come back up again, and then we'll all go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm staying at the mouth with the other end of the rope. You guys are going in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hopefully the rope can go this far? How long is this rope?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rope you found here? It's probably 60 to 70 feet at most.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's why I'm at the mouth of the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tie it up to the mouth of the grate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They can just come up it, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you do that. You guys all jump back in a second time?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This area, the footholds aren't as easy because it's not quite as close to the elements, so the DC's a little higher, but if you guys grab hold, you can go ahead and make a check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: High, come on, you guys. Oh my goodness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20! (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck yes, Jester!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I got a ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That with your modifier is a 23?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23, okay! You both hold on this time. You're having a hard time getting any sort of a foothold into the space. Jester, you angrily look down and taking your elbow, you jam a section of the stone until it breaks off and you find a section of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hot. I say about myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Noticing this Yasha, you do the same and smash. You guys actually break a few footholds into the side of this tunnel. Once you're set into place, you look at each other, count to the right moment and pull! I mean, you've seen Jester do some cool stuff, but in that moment it's a Rosie Riveter--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Muscle moment-- as guns going, the metal bars bend slightly (metal creak). From underneath the water, you hear the echo and then it comes loose from the mooring and begins sinking down towards both of you. The heavy metal is now sandwiching you guys towards the bottom and you push off and manage to get it to rotate and you swim around it without having an issue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Up and up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Up and breathe!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's strangely--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Jester, you are very strong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So are you!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, let's see what is out here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh man, we're like a strong couple of women.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Since I saw them go up, I'm going to swim forward to where I saw them disappear, and seeing the grate gone, I'm going to come back out and make my way up towards the boat to let them know they made it through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you guys watch as Fjord breaks the surface without the other two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they alive?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, they made it through the second grate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, just like I told you, they made it through the second grate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, because you can see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can see.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, why am I even coming back? (inhale) (splash)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I dive in and follow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we just leaving a boat here, is that the--.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well that'll totally--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, don't worry, I'll take it back to the shore for us in stealth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The bottom rope is tied to the bottom so if you tie the rope to the boat, you got yourself an anchor or a moor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys want to try and meet us where that pillar is?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure! I'll go to the warehouse and try to break in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sounds terrible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think it's a better idea for us to stay together. Nott, you know this is a recurring thing and I think we should-- what is going on? What is this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't like water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but what if we need to go through water?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mostly we don't. We don't live near the ocean.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mostly, but right now we need to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not-- I don't. (sigh)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let me make a suggestion. And I cast Suggestion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Yes! Break through that shit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Better than what I was going to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Woo!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think you should just try it one time and see how it goes, and if it goes well then we know that you are good for the future.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (creepy voice) Try it, you might like it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like you to make a wisdom saving throw, Nott, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! (laughter and cheers)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your fear subside momentarily and you find yourself instinctually nodding as you know what, maybe trying it once and seeing how it goes is exactly what Caleb would want.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, well, you do know best Caleb. All right, this sounds like a good idea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah we are--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want to dolphin ride my back?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure-- are you a good swimmer?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean I might not be Fjord levels but yeah I can swim.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And all she does is eat fish and do push-ups, I think she'll be good underwater.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the other way--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the booze talking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, all right. I wait... Deuces, you coming in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right mermaid, scale me down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep, that whiskey's working. Ready? We're going to do this together.

lines.name: MARISHA, SAM
lines.text: (breathing heavily)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One, two, three and we go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (squealing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (splash) Going under water, you hear the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (still squealing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The diminishing squeak as it slowly vanishes beneath the surface. Caduceus and Caleb sitting up in the ship with a weasel and a puppy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, the animals!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm holding the weasel!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god! No, it's going to die!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got to get rid of them at some point!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! I don't want it to die!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let it happen! Let it happen! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as Beau swims-- now Beau, go ahead and make an athletics check for me because you are technically carrying two passengers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That weasel is about to die!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: An athletics check?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the dog is just on the boat!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that cocked?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a little cocked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a little cocked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can do the balance thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's technically, it's slightly cocked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that counts.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Counts?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is cocked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a good roll though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's cocked as fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, if you can rest a d4 on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the test.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's an okay roll. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strongly pushing through, using the grate to go ahead and pull yourself forward beneath the surface. You bring your goggles down so you can actually see where you're going once the light begins to subside. You still hear in the water above you (squeal).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I totally forgot about the weasel by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you don't even know. You know nothing about it. You're just like "I got this." Swing upward, break the surface. (inhale) Come up from the top and there you can see Yasha and Jester waiting for you, they are stepped up into the tube.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ay!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nott!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You made it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (nervous laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (out of breath) You did good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, that was invigorating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear (coughing up water). You look down as this waterlogged weasel is now like coughing and sneezing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah! Sprinkle!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's awake and conscious. You're just pushing on its chest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's Nugget?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. You didn't have me look after Nugget.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because now we are stuck with a dog. So what do we do Caduceus? What do you think?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we get the dog to blink to us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, don't do that, the dog will die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everybody else is going into this thing in the tunnel. I don't know if you want to go into the water, if you want to just hang out here and hope that everything goes okay or if you've got a preference. But, I'll tell you what. You can hop on with me if want to go with us on this adventure. If you'd rather just sit here, I'll leave you a little food and we'll probably be back in a couple of hours.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're speaking in Sylvan, correct?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, of course.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, I'm listening in Sylvan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So you just want to hang I guess?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just sitting in the boat, looks over the edge "(whining)."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want to come with me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check. Actually this would be animal handling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Animal handling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 20-- I'm sorry, not 20, 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In your robes, there's a comfortable little cradle that you form there and then (puppy whining) (poof) and then appears into the small pocket in your arm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hold your breath on the count of three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In Sylvan, Caleb says, If it goes wrong, pup, you know, bamf out and in and maybe that'll buy you a little more time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh you'll be fine, we'll just give you a little-- I can just give you a little tap if anything goes wrong.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't care, let's go. (splash)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to slow my breathing, I'm going to take one last look around to see if anyone notices any of the commotion that we're causing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really should have left the puppy with my mom.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, my perception check was bad for me, which is an 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking around, no one, in particular, seems to be paying much mind to what your business is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've slowed my breathing, I've calmed myself and I'm just going to take a very gentle dive and move in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we tied the boat, yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we tied the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will ask you to make an athletics check because you are swimming mostly with one arm and your legs, as you are cradling the puppy with the other.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (exertion noises) You make your way, partway through the tunnel and under the grate. You get past that point, look up, you push off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're tired, your lungs are starting to hurt from just the amount of effort it's taking to go this distance with one arm and your legs kicking. You've waded in the ponds near the graveyard--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never done this before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not a practiced swimmer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah do you have hooves?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can thankfully hold my breath a long time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, the puppy though--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The puppy is having-- am I feeling a twitch, or is it having a--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the second half of this journey.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh that's better, 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! Yeah, you get down low to the bottom of it and push upward. Right at that moment, you see this little burst of bubble (poof) in your arm, just as you're about to break the surface. You look down, frightened, and he's not there and as you look up, break the surface (inhale) come up and you watch as (poof) in the air--

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You catch Nugget (panting). Just waterlogged, dripping.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You brought the dog?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay Nugget!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He wanted to come.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit, the dog and the weasel survived. A hundred foot swim underwater.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have really good pets.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we all here? Caleb, are you here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The weasel looks miserable. Sprinkle is just like (snarling)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll put him in my hood and stuff and warm up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He curls up in there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where's Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah I'm here. I would have beat Caduceus here, because he was struggling. I'm so proud of you! You made it all this way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just had a feeling overcome me, that I was-- I've never done anything like that before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know what the good news is? You're going to have that feeling for the next seven hours and 50 minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not real, is it? (laughing)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just start drinking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're all clustered up in this small tunnel. It's maybe eight feet across, and it's cylindrical in its shape.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll look around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About a foot and a half of water, depending upon where you're standing in it, and it continues down, dark into the next chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if the water comes in while we're in here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That'd be bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably hurry up then, huh?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin was not able to get through it, but maybe one of you two ladies could bust that open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could try.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. We could give it a go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's only about a foot and a half across, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's right over there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's head quietly in that direction I think might be--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But then what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Frumpkin!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Octopus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you point out the grate to them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys have moved through the tunnel, into the small chamber break in the tunnel path there with the pillar, Caleb points over to the grate, and you can see it's a pretty dense lattice of metal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we get our fingers in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Each bar is about two inches apart from each other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thunder queens.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's try it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we try to bust it out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Go ahead and make another strength check. The beast team here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most of you would not even fit through it, but you're unable to get it to budge at all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we see through it at all? What's in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As they're looking, I'll just creep towards the pillar and cautiously peek around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this a fancy room or is this just a more of a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking around, it resembles a subterranean sewer, it's mostly just stone and masonry that's slick from the moisture. And the air itself is very humid down here. There is a lot of moisture that gathers across the stone, and there's streaks of color and minerals that have gathered on the walls over time. You still have the taste of the brine in your mouth from your time under the ocean, but the air in here is still also very ocean-like and salty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it seem like water is ever up along the walls, or does it seem like the water is always at the level it's at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check..

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While she does that, can I look and see if there's any writing on the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking at it, there are certain markers and the levels that say that there have at times been different levels of water in here, but it doesn't seem often enough, like certain levels of minerals and sediment that you can see. But a lot of them seem older, and haven't been reached in a while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I think we're safe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're looking for writing? You don't see any writing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No type of directional marks? Any type of, using my background, any types of Thieves' Cant for smuggling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck you Gil, you haven't been good to me today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good to you in the past, but not tonight apparently.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said perception?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 20 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking around you don't see any markings in the stonework, but as you go across the pillar in the center, looking for any sort of details, you hear this faint-- almost like the sound of a crashing wave and the rushing of water, and you glance around the edge, and in the corner you can see the water that previously was just moving from your breaking the surface moving through, has started to-- (fwoosh) almost like it's forming a small, occasional whirlpool, and then comes to rest for a moment and then--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it about time for high tide?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that would have passed by now because it's past midday, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While they're discussing, I point at Frumpkin on Yasha's back and snap him out and then submerge myself by that small grate and look and keep my hand above the water, and snap again and Frumpkin is past the gate on the other side of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Frumpkin-- the tunnel?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The small grate that we couldn't get open, so he's on the other side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Frumpkin has appeared on the other side. While this is happening, you watch as the small whirlpool begins to gather up and rise above the surface in what is a roughly basketball-sized swirl of water. Like an inverse whirlpool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I really feel like this is like something and it might attack us, and it might kill us. I don't know, maybe--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A second one begins to emerge from the water behind you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is going on?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mighty Nein!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it spheres?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're essentially looking at reverse whirlpools that are rising up out of the water, coming to a point as the water seems to be almost guiding itself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh jesus, wide at the bottom, thin at the top.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to take my two shurikens and (throwing noises) into one and see what happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll for attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: From Kentucky, it's sure-ooh-ken.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for an attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For two? Both of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That first one is an 18, so 25. And the second one is 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of them hit. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I think this is a thing. Like a thing to kill.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because this is all happening very quickly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nine-- sorry. 12. 13 total, 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Quick, let me check one thing real fast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They are impervious to throwing star damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, okay. So, good to know. So it was nine and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 13 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And we're going to start with rolling initiative when we return.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: and Canada, excluding Quebec because of weird giveaway laws. But however, you do get the possibility of winning this fantastic purple heart dice tower system! Including the Osmet Coast cartography by Deven Rue.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is so cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the one you had last campaign right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but not with a map on it. That's amazing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fantastic Deven Rue's the artist. But yeah, so the word tonight is "ruby." R-U-B-Y.

lines.name: CAST
lines.text: Ruby!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Only enter it once or you will be disqualified, but go ahead and jump over.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Best lay ever!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Congratulations, dark man who searches, the searcher who lives in the dark, Darksearchman. You are the winner. We'll get that back to you as soon as we have the opportunity. So we'll get your info and congratulations.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right friends. So, last we left off. I need you all to roll initiative.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right! I almost forgot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You already rolled.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it doesn't count because I'm up two now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's even better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: CAST
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so 25 to 20..

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so it's Beau. Anyone else 25 to 20. 20 to 15?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no. You got 19.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got 19! Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. All right, 15 to ten?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Ashley's back.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughing)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, you rolled low initiative.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, What did you get?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then taking up the rear.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did you get Ash?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I even have a plus to my initiative this time around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You rolled a seven.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I still rolled low. I rolled a seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up first, you watch as these two emerging whirlpools begin to form into these amorphous angry spinning and intense-looking tiny water spouts with bashing pseudopods that swing out and attempt to make some sort of heavy impact with anybody who's nearby. They seem strangely sentient, as opposed to being some sort of manifested trap. However, with that first initial attack from Beau, that's the first surprise round, we'll be going into combat. At the top of it, it is Beau once again. So what are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Guys! Anybody? Still me. (pop pop pop)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two attacks, one with my staff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you running up to attack?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a natural one on that first attack. Well that sucks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your staff, and as you give a big old push, you watch as it just dissolves and falls below and you're just swinging into the air. It hits the stonework and (gong). You feel part of your elbow lock up for a second and it feels a little numb.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second attack. Still not great, 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh wait, but that hit before, right? Okay, seven damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, this is with your--?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My second attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your staff as well?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Still with my staff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two attacks with my-- right. Attack, attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You notice the first impacts of the shurikens that you had thrown seem to pass through the water with some impact, but not heavily. And the second staff hit that strikes seems to not be as impactful against the wood. Or maybe against the water form of this creature.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to put my staff around, focus my chi, and then do a palm attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine misses. So with your bonus action, just swings wide. These things are small but nimble, and they keep-- their form seems to constantly be shifting and changing position. It's like fighting a miniature squall in the middle of it. So you're like "Ah!" No impact.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, next up Jester. You're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to cast... Spiritual Weapon! Woo!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt, is it pitch dark in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's pitch dark?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no light source in here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Release the Spiritual Weapon!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have my goggles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Caleb starts hearing all these noises in his--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I have the Transmuter's Stone set to dark vision.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's right! Because you do have dark vision. So yeah, right now guys--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, all of us can see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where do you want it to go?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caduceus, you can see?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I believe so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, no. Firbolgs can't. So, Caduceus is the only one in pitch black.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm currently in... hold on, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right above, next to Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to hit it! Or I'm going to try.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, you'd have to move to have line of sight on where it was dropped, so you'd have to shift.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'll shift to my left. (singing) To my left, to my-- yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. So, moving up next to Yasha, you watch as the spiritual weapon flash happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 11 points of damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. While the impacts of Beau's strikes with the staff and the shurikens weren't doing a whole lot it seemed, damaging but not anything as hardy as you were hoping, the Spiritual Weapon comes down and seems to cleave it in half. As it separates and reforms itself, you hear this splashing and swishing of water, it sounds almost like a lowered, angry growl.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I'm going to Toll the Dead on him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and roll. Oh, that's its roll. It's a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A wisdom save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wisdom save. That is a natural four, so go for it. Damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (yelling) 2d12! 11 points of damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good round.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It vibrates through the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the impact of the cantrip strikes it, and the water seems to shake itself around for a moment, shifting as the sound vibrations are forcing it to coast in a strange design in its space. That ends your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And that's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That brings us to Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll move up to this northeastern corner up here. Turning and seeing the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You push past them with your feet as you make it there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. I'll throw two Eldritch Blasts to this creature behind Caduceus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that appeared behind the rest? Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two attacks. First one is 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? Just hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just hits. I'll roll the second one, well fuck. That's 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 misses. So, roll damage on the first strike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gotcha. Fuck you. Five points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Magic seems to cut through whatever defense it has.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Fjord's. It's now their turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one, who currently is engaged directly with you, is going to wisp around into the water and emerge on the other side of Beau and is going to go ahead and attempt to Whirlpool Strike you. I need you to make a strength saving throw, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it emerges, you feel the water beneath you begin to whip into a torrent, and you are swept off of your feet and knocked prone and are considered currently restrained as it moves into your space. It's now currently swirling around you, and you're having a hard time moving. It's now forcing water into your mouth. You can't breathe in the moment. You are whelmed by the elemental.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that ends its turn. The one over here is going to go ahead, because it's closest to Caduceus, it's just going to shift up into your space, get in contact with both you and Caleb, and it's going to attempt to whelm you, as well. I need you to go ahead-- it can only target one person-- but I need you to make a strength saving throw for me, Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. That's a 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17? That's a success! You feel the same water swirling around your legs, and you manage to pull back and wrench your legs free as the torrent comes to a slow crawl once more, and the creature's form emerges. You can see the water now forming these two large sledgehammer-like fists that hang at its somewhat four, four-and-a-half-foot tall torso. That's going to end both of their turns. Caduceus, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How well can I see right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are considered blind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like, until I can see well enough to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you can see an enemy, you will release your Sacred Flame.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, Sacred Flame. In the meantime, I'll just stay to myself and maybe try and walk around to, yeah, just like there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you can hear it and the focus of this swirling, splashing sound.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I could use a little light!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so Caduceus side-steps. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah okay, so I was looking down towards this grate under the water, and I heard the room go to hell behind me and hear the splashing where Beauregard is, so I move in that direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you move this way?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, it's going to go ahead and take a swipe at you with a slam attack. That is a 22 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take it, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You suffer-- oh wow. That is 12 points of bludgeoning damage. You get slammed in the lower back, the hip area, and almost spin from the blow of it, but continue to stumble forward over to the position you wanted to be.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, I stumble forward, and I'm reaching into my pockets, and I pull out the iron powder, and I throw it into the air again, and I go (whoof) with my hands, and Beauregard enlarges within the grasp of this... thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Still restrained.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but with advantage on strength checks now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I will go as far into that corner, hiding between Fjord and the corner, if I'm able to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So, that is about as far as you can get right there because Fjord is currently in the far corner. And I'm marking you with concentration just so I can keep tabs on that. All right, so that ends Caleb's go. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I see the damage done to my lovely friends, and seeing as I care about Caleb slightly more, I will attack the one that hit-- no offense-- I will attack the one that hit Caleb with a shot of a Tinkertop Blaster, whatever it's called.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, so that's 20-something to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's engaged with firbolg over here, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mhmm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's four, four, four, so plus yikes five is--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you. (laughing) That.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the bolt hits and there's a spark as it impacts, and for a second, it seems to almost lose its corporeal form then flickers back in. The bolt sinks down into the water below, beneath the knee-level of the liquid that seems to consume the entire chamber.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He took an arrow to the knee. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which as a note guys, those who have been moving around, I should mention it. I've been keeping tabs under my own right. Moving through this is considered difficult terrain because you are about knee- to thigh-high in water, and you're having to basically wade through as you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Except for Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Except for Nott, who's standing above it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about Fjord? His swim speed is his movement speed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, the Mariner's Armor would give you a swim speed. So you can move through it at your regular speed. So you don't have to worry about it. That is correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will use my bonus action to... Well, I'll use my movement to sort of tuck back into the hallway there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, if I can, and then I'll bonus action to hide. Press myself up against a wall or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll probably have to move a little farther back to break sight from one of these enemies, but go ahead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's fine. All right. Not great. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait is this... stealth? 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good to know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was looking for the hide ability.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gotcha. Yeah, that's just an action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have I been drunk at this point? I don't know, am I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not quite-- No, you would've had to have been to go through, if you weren't affected by a Suggestion spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so I'm okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're on the verge. Like, you're tipsy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you're not drunk. All right, that finishes your go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I told you water was terrible!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've seen Beau suddenly grown to a larger size but still being swarmed by the water of this elemental form.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well for one, I would like to rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is it possible to try to pull her out, or am I able to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Am I able to attack it... without hurting her?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nein.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't want to try it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just go for it! (gurgling sounds)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, you move up adjacent to Beau and the one creature, and what are you going to do? Are you going to attempt and pull her out?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to attempt and pull her out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you use your action. I need you to go ahead and make a strength check. You have advantage because you are raging.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (as Beau) I feel alive!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I haven't felt anything since she left!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, no. Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't get any sort of purchase, and you can't pull her out, unfortunately.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that a strength check?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I should've attacked.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you make it with advantage? You're raging.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you rolled... Was that not with advantage? Roll again!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got you, boo.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shit. That's cocked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt, I've been rolling the wrong number of die every time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, hold on. You've been rolling the wrong number of dice?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've been rolling 3d6, but it should've been four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So, I got an extra one point of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your other hand, you get it underneath Beau's larger arm and wrench her free from the creature's grasp.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (deep voice) Thanks!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (deep voice) Welcome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Beau, you are still in this space, a little bit--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (deep voice) Wow!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (deep voice) Hey, shorty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (deep voice) Hey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still in the space of the creature, but you've managed to be pulled free from it. So, you're still prone, but you are not currently whelmed by it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends Yasha's go, unless you want to move?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I'm going to stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull your sword out of the wall and get ready for the next round of combat. This brings us to the top of the round. Beau, you're up! Jester, you're next.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (deep voice) I'm back! Can I do like a cool, monk-like kick and go pop pop! Like two unarmed attacks as I kick-kick with my legs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, yeah! Make--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Some capoeira shit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can. Which, as you do, it's a spray and spin windmill of water in the air around it. Go ahead and make your attacks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First two unarmed. That first one is an 18, being a 25. Second one's an eight, being a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, Tracy!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (Valley girl voice) Oh my god, Tracy's back!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Added damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's a suck balls roll. Two ones on my sixes. So two, but I got a four and a three from that extra d4, so nine. Nein!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of damage to it from the spinning kick landing on the ground. You are now just barely mid-calf in water, but it's also about ten feet tall in here, so you're having to hunch a little bit. Your head actually hits the ceiling a bit. You're like (groaning).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm now going to spend a ki point because I hit twice to do Extract Aspects.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to learn--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't think you can spend a ki point to do that. It's just an ability you get to use.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right, we switched that. Oh! It's just an ability I get to use now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right. So, I hit twice. I would like to know its constitution saving throw and if it has any damage... not resistances, but the opposite of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Immunities?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vulnerabilities.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vulnerabilities, okay. Its constitution saving throw is a plus three. It's not technically a vulnerability, but you do see that if it takes cold damage, it partially freezes, which reduces its speed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We know things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just shout it out and say, I think if we freeze the thing, it'll like freeze because water! And then I'm going to spend another ki point and do Flurry of Blows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, two more strikes. Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The second one is not good, it's a nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so the first one does hit, second one misses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That is-- ooh! Ten damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten damage. Very good. So with that, as you're standing there, you go ahead and swing one fist down and it strikes right at the center of it, and you watch as it separates for a second. As it reforms, you go for another strike, and this time it manages to duck just out of the way, seeing the precursor of that strike, and it dodges entirely. That finishes your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That brings us to Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bring my Spiritual Weapon down!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That sucks. This plus four is five!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I'm going to use Guiding Bolt at the other one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm assuming-- tell me if I'm wrong-- because it's a flash of light that streaks towards the creature, that would give enough light for Caduceus to send something out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll allow it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Okay, so how do I do Guiding Bolt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you roll an attack roll, so a spell attack roll, ranged spell attack roll. That's cocked, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 11 plus seven. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll damage for your Guiding Bolt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is 4d6!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, in that one moment, your eyes suddenly focus in on the glowing form, almost in slow motion as this elemental is slowly bursting from the radiant energy, and you see that moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sacred Flame.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that's a wisdom saving throw?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dex saving throw. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, it'll take the damage on that one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (counting) 12 points of I believe-- is that radiant damage? Yeah. 12 points of radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're both looking a little hurt and a little aggressive. They're now starting to get a little frenzied. That ends your turn, Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Advantage on attacks against that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually-- yes, because that wasn't an attack roll. Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I approach the water fuck that's on Mr. Clay? And I will use Booming Blade against it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Advantage!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, she used Guiding Bolt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amazing.

lines.name: LIAM
