lines.text: She lit it up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So at 5th level it deals 2d8 thunder damage to the target.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. So 2d8--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four. So eight, plus whatever the modifier is. Or it's just 2d8, right? Booming Blade is still an attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah that's it, that's just 2d8. So eight points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of damage. (impact noise) It is currently encircled by the booming energy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Booming energy, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the heck is that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (effeminate voice) What's that, Travis, what's that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tell us what it means.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Booming dick energy! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: BDE.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. That ends your turn, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. It's now their turn. So this one here, now low on health and a bit frenzied, is going to go ahead and take two strikes at the enlarged Beauregard that has been its issue at this time. That's going to be a 21 to hit and a 22 to hit. 15 and 16 naturally.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: H2 oh, no! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh my god, Sam.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nasty!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What, you numb your own tongue with that one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 18 points of bludgeoning damage to you, Beauregard. For its being so small, the short bursts of impact, it seems that in its harrowed state it's lashing out with all that it can. The other one is going to go ahead and attempt to make a strike at Fjord and a strike at Caduceus. The one against Fjord is a natural one. It goes to swing out towards you and you hold the blade up and you watch as it actually splits its extruding watery arm across the blade. It divides, then splashes into--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Water on water violence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Falls harmlessly onto the ground and it has to reform a new pseudopod. The other arm swings back towards Caduceus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Science!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 13 to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That does not hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, you do have an attack of opportunity if you want to take one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure. Is it disadvantage because I can't see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And booming energy. So when he moves he takes an additional 2d8.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: SAM, LIAM, ASHLEY
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine points of booming damage. (impact noise)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nein! It's like that glass of water in Jurassic Park.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the same roll. That's 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Caduceus's turn, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm still blind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still blind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At some point I'm going to have to-- I've never fixed the fact that I'm a cantrip down, which I will have to fix at some point because this is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You should.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to ready another--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a treasure chest?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a barrel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ting!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's one gold coin. I'm just going to ready another Guiding Bolt for the second I can see anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. Finishing Caduceus's turn, Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to move into that corner and I'm going to rifle into my pockets and pull out a small snake's gut peppered in powdered rhubarb leaf, and I stick my hand out and point at the one messing with my human friend over there, and I take the snake's gut and I pull it back like I am drawing a bowstring as I mutter and I let go and cast Melf's Acid Arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're you in the opening title sequence right now!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, that is correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're doing--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're doing it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're doing it! It's so real.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you spell the first word of that spell?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Melf. M-E-L-F.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Melf.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unfortunately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's a very prominent sorcerer, or wizard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You love it. That is a 23 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 does hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. (counting) Nine points of acid damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of acid damage to it. As the acid arrow strikes and impacts on its form, there's this splash of acidic liquid that actually should-- I believe Beau also has to make?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It doesn't say anything, at least, in the D&D Beyond. Let's look in the actual book.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: D&D Beyond is the greatest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Doesn't say anything about splash attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the impact is lessened. However, let me double-check here for the acid arrow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Science. Math. Acid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't do me wrong, D&D Beyond.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The water elemental is going to sit there and have a long thought about its relationships.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That doesn't matter. Older systems would do splash acid damage, but not in this one. So yeah, you manage to pull out of the way as it falls back and dissolves amongst the rest of it, a little bit of sea foam left behind in its wake.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hard water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sea foam, that's all you are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, the one next to me. Thanks!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to tuck my snake gut back into its pocket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Finishing Caleb's turn, Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will fire my arrow thing at the creature, striking it with 20 something! 20 things. Is it engaged in something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is engaged with Jester, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's engaged to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll your extra thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did. It's still terrible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's six, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not terrible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 17 again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17? As that one impacts, you see it reaching out with both of its fists towards Jester. As it strikes her, its midsection just turns into bits of foam and sea water as it splashes against her armor and shield.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hate water!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord, I am your dream!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. See? No big deal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (panting heavily) Big deal!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Water's your friend.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Water is terrible. It tried to kill us! It actively wants to kill us!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any drains on the floor as we walk around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you glance around, keeping an eye out, make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Feeling through the floor and finding your space in here, you do not find any grates or any other exits beyond the tunnel ahead of you, the tunnel you came from, and the small grate on the side. But it's high enough where the water doesn't actually meet that level yet. But you do see the trailing signs of runoff and various bits of minerals that have gathered and dripped out over time to cause some discoloration to the stone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caleb, didn't you want to explore that smaller tunnel?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (breathing heavily) Ja.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you okay? Do you need healing? Because Caduceus can heal you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's really good at it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I really actually have a-- it'd be easier if I could see where I am or--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, sorry!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cast Dancing Lights and the four globules start floating around in the air.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's much better.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja. Okay, Frumpkin. Would you like to-- are you still there? And he's still on the other side. I'm going to have a quick look. Somebody--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here you are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I send Frumpkin further in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As Frumpkin pulls his way through the tunnel, slowly the tentacles unfurling and dragging him forward through this slick, somewhat slimy algae grooved tube. It goes on for about a good 150 feet before it meets another grate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At this point I can't send in-- I can only watch, but I did tell him to go. So what would you-- well it's up to you what Frumpkin would interpret that as.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you can't watch at this distance?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well I think what we've established--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you can view, but you cannot give actions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can view, but I can't give commands. But I said to go in, so it's up to you what--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Frumpkin comes to this next grate. Go ahead and make a strength check for Frumpkin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is-- oh, for Frumpkin. So I need to go to a different tag. That's a three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a three. Frumpkin is unable to push past that secondary grate and fighting with it for a bit, returns to you within range to communicate and tells you there's no further to that tunnel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You never know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who knows. Maybe Fjord could swim down there if we could get this gate open, but.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a real small tunnel. I'm not looking to Shawshank my way down that thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but you are a bean pole.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am not. I am actually quite stocky, thank you very much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stocky?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I am ripped to fuck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How many stones do you weigh?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So many.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What size are the stones? Just curious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're a pound each. What are you talking about? I'm talking about--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Perhaps we should continue.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just tap the stone. Ten hit points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait. Is he ten stones?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where does this tunnel go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where does that next tunnel go?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The other one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that had to be there? Go ahead and make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Splash, splash, splash.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha, you do it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I got a five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a lot of water ahead. And some walls.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's just a lot of water and I think just more stone walls.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nothing treacherous?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's very astute.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't think it's bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there an intense discoloration, maybe, of the mold underneath the grate? Is it a different kind of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, on the smaller one, you mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to kick through the barrel while he's doing that. Did I find a gold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't shatter, you're now stuck with your leg partially in a barrel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're so good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And you guys already checked the pillar for any--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We looked around for writing and stuff, but.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I give the pillar a look-see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In it, the smell in there is of deep briny ocean and possibly something that long rotted and has since given this faint scent of earth and decay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caduceus, you might want that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. God, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel your way around the exterior of the column. Glancing around, you don't see any particular signs of there being anything different, beyond the construction of the rest of the chamber. Nothing hidden, no language or discerning characteristics.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nothing strange.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's keep booking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Remind me, it just keeps going forward? Oh no, Frumpkin, no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In the same way there's another large grate at the end of the passage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no grate, it's just another continuation of the tunnel. The same size of the one that you entered this chamber from.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So a tunnel going forward.

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.text: However, this blast of fire rocks the interior of the chamber. You watch as both of the bodyguards (grunting and panting) look up at themselves. lines.text: Just do whatever feels right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's must be stressful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah very.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's being waterboarded.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is, yeah. We'll say--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's waterboarding, basically.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of. So yeah, you're stabilized.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you're fine. Physically.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For two more rounds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, there are dragons in this world.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll see where it goes. We'll see where it goes in two rounds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends Caleb's turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have faith in you, Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's all up to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to step forward. I'm going to stay away from the water thing. I'm going to use my duplicate to go forward and touch Caduceus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And she's going to cast Cure Wounds at third level.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that's 3d8.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dude, I was sweating.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that is (counting) 19 points of health.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then with me, I'm going to Sacred Flame. For myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, Cure Wounds is still an action, so you can't do both in one round, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spiritual Weapon is still somewhere in those tentacles but you can't see where that is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just going to flail around with the Spiritual Weapon and hope I hit something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an attack with disadvantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can a tentacle wield the lollipop?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say that probably happens there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! That's fun.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it! It was so good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's okay, it's a 15. But the other one was a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, got you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It unfortunately does not hit anybody because of the-- the one that it strikes has a higher armor class than 15 but--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I forgot something. When Algar starts his turn you take 2d6 cold damage. So he was--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He was dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Technically--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well no, he's at two death saves.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. He'll be at two instead of one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I thought he takes down two when he's dead?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, that's at a melee attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a melee attack that does that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That ends Jester's turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He won't even know why he was dead, though. We didn't even to tell him it was from the Ruby of the Sea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't be a fucking creep!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to move my own person towards Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to move me towards Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's very extreme. It's very extreme.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Going past to get there, the water elemental gets an attack of opportunity on you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he does?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I didn't realize it was within range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, now you know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's a big guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 17 to hit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He doesn't hit me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He doesn't hit you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a shield.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (clanging) You shrug it off from your armor and shield.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: (clanging)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your full movement there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, does that end your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to the compatriots here. At the top of their turn they take how much damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 2d6? Go ahead and roll 2d6. For both of the dwarven bodyguards.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For both of the bodyguards?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could I have used my Hellish Rebuke? If he didn't actually hit me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use your reaction to, you can, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! I want to use my Hellish Rebuke.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, no, if it didn't hit you I don't think. Does it say an attack or a hit? I believe it has to be a hit, doesn't it? When you're damaged?

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Actions.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Actions, reactions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Five points of acid damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gotcha. So those left standing--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry, full damage. Full damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just barely. Full damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They do take-- if they do their dexterity saving throw they take half. Again. It says that if you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, dex save every turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A success and a fail-- no, both successes actually. Both rolled really high that round. All right, so two damage to each, actually. All right, and they can't see anything. They both haven't moved since the last thing happened, so one reaches down and you hear some rummaging. He gets dragged--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Their speed is halved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wilhelm scream?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not enough movement for him to get in so--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a big ass sphere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Other one's just going to move into this space here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So if you move into that sphere, is it utter blackness?

lines.name: MATT, TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I have dark vision goggles--

lines.name: MATT, TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it help?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Rummaging around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear some more rummaging. You hear a, "(grunts) What the fuck?" That's it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what I'd do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Screams, ahh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sounds like Algar's voice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Oh! Nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sounds like what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, fed him a potion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His bodyguards are prepped with a few things. Nott, your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, I'd just like to point out that your mom said, "This guy's been bothering me a little," and we blew him up, and attacked him with tentacles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "He's just been a little annoying."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You defend your mom.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It got bigger when we got in here, that's my feeling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't fuck with someone's mom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what's going on with Caleb so I will move over toward Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Check in on my boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's currently facedown, floating in the water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I see Jester over there and I know that she does have the ability to heal so I will-- Wow, I don't know if I trust her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's currently face down in the water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's face down in the water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on, I heal people.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope, can't trust you. I will just burn all my actions to do it myself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Agency breakup.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So five--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I within 30 feet of Caleb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30? There you'll run back in the water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, back where I was with Yasha am I within 30 feet of him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No you're a little further away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay I'll get another ten feet closer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll get you there. You can probably get him. It's 30 feet from you there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will use my Mage Hand to take a healing potion out of my hand and shoot it 30 feet towards him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mage Hand was here last.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will cast it again using an action, next to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grab my potion and take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I'll let that happen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then I will use my bonus action to use my Mage Hand to pour it into his gullet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, I'll let you do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It shoots under the water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sheer force of the vial being jammed into his mouth. Caleb, make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Strength saving throw. Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not break any teeth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks, Pike die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Damn it, I was hoping-- having a crystal vial jammed with that speed into your mouth there was a good chance you were going to lose a tooth or two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep, just deep-throated it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Could have made you more charming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So go ahead and roll heal for Caleb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I roll heal, what do I roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Was it a basic healing potion? 2d4 plus two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just got to relax.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Heal seven hit points, there you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Nott's turn. Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit! It's me. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's just a black sphere and occasionally you see this dark, strange, grayish, slime-covered tentacles that whip out and back into the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's mine!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to say, I look over at Fjord across the parapet and I go: Ah, what--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But how do I--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't go in there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do I do though, then? Fuck! I am going to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean homie is right next to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want to hurt him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, he going to hurt you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to move away from genie homie, and then hold my action for--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Move away from him right there you mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I want to move away from him and I'm going to hold my action until I can see preferably Aldar, but if not, one of the dwarves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, got you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Algar, not Aldar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Al Gore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got you. Finishes your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holding my action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau's holding that. Top of the round is the water elemental. It's going to go ahead and move over--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get him Jester!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still carrying Caduceus along. You get to go ahead and make an attack of opportunity to see if it shifts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on Yash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you have the Sentinel feat.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ooh, ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten does not hit. Goes wide unfortunately.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Even though you're raging?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, reckless! Reckless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does reckless last until the end of your turn or until--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can do it every turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, but it's out of her turn; this is a reaction. Let me double check real fast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anything not to go unconscious again.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Zsundie, Zsundie, Zsundie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: During this turn, it doesn't work towards reactions unfortunately, so swings wide. It's going to go ahead and move in. Let's see if it means-- yeah, it gets its Whelm back. It's going to go ahead and move into Jester's space so now both Jester and Caduceus are caught inside--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it attacking me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to attempt to, I need you to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm glad I saved Caleb.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was an aggressive roll. Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you are currently restrained. You're grappled and restrained.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Both of our clerics are grappled and restrained.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but they're alive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not for long.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, does he do damage to me at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 13 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hellish Rebuke.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, constitution saving throw?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the belly of the beast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Regardless, that is a-- hold on, what is the save type on that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dexterity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dexterity, that is going to be a 13. That's 11 plus two. That's a failure, I believe, on your DC.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No it's not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, because it's a racial ability?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, so no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, by one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Takes half damage right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Half damage! Okay so that's still 3d10 of cold damage

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a lot! You could freeze it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And cold damage hurts more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, reduces its speed by 20 feet until the end of its next turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (counting) 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. That was, I wouldn't say hellish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it reaches and gets a little frozen and its movement is a little sluggish. It's looking really hurt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And what was it? 13 damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 points of bludgeoning damage. And because technically Caduceus is still--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the top of the turn. No, because you got healed by Jester so you also take 13 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, we're still alive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep, still alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's going to end--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's all I needed was just to survive the round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The water elemental's turn. It's now Zsundie's turn. Zsundie is going to fly into the air right up here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And release another water jet through to both Beau and Fjord. I need you both to make dexterity saving throws please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh dex saves. Me and Fjord?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You and Fjord.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is rough.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dex save.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fjord just went to a dark place

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You succeed, Fjord. You fail.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What!? I rolled one less than him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's DC 16.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you love her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's going to be 21 points of bludgeoning damage to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 points. And ten points to you, Fjord. I need you to make a constitution saving throw to see if you maintain concentration.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, right. That's a natural 19 plus four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, you succeed. And with that it's going to go ahead and continue flying, coasting around out of your range, and turning his attention towards the center column there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we get knocked back by the jets?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got knocked for failing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you do. I'm getting to that point right now. So on a success you are neither pushed nor prone, but you do (launching sound).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I-- (yelling) Catch me! Aw fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 feet back technically, so you would (crashing sound) right in the ground there. You sploosh into the water and you are prone down at the bottom again. So that ends his go. Caduceus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caducey, do something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the top of your turn, because you are still whelmed you take seven points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Staying in that water elemental is not good news.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have had nothing I could do this round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. End of your turn, make a death saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So would dropping Hunger of Hadar be an action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you just drop the spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You just drop it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to use my speed to enter the hallway. Five, ten, 20 before I get to the thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Your animals are with you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you need to get out of waterfuck?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Your animals can't breathe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So many things need to happen. No matter what we're pretty fucked right now. This is terrible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what? Fuck those guys! I'm going to stay right where I am, where I can still see the water thing and I'll send two Eldritch Blasts toward the water where Clay is. I don't give a fuck about Algar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the water elemental? Go for it. And you're not doing anything else, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And make sure you're not going to hit Jester or I in any of those hits either. That will kill us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll your attacks.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can also grab him out next turn. I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, because you're in it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But if I hit the wave it'll hit them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha hasn't had an issue with it yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And regardless there's a genie, so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And what's the initiative order? It's Fjord then...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord then Yasha.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's not do that. I'm going to drop Hunger of Hadar and I'm going to send two Eldritch Blasts at both of the bodyguards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you drop Hunger of Hadar you can see they're both looking rather ragged and Algar is on the ground, coughing and sputtering as one of the bodyguards is pulling and tosses an empty health potion to the ground that shatters. As soon as it goes dark they both go "Huh!" and all three of them look at you. Go ahead and roll attacks for both the bodyguards.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is a 12 for the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That misses that guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And 16 on the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 does hit him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fucking Algar, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is ten points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits the wall, (grunts) and crumples into a pile, unconscious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Five, ten, 15, and I'll use the rest of my 30 feet to get as close as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're going to Aldar? Algar? Al Gore?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, 20, 25-- You can move right up into the space right next-- looking down at Algar right now. End your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (heavy metal guitar starts)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to go up and try to stabby-stab what I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. (whispers) Oh my god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes! Heavy metal when Yasha talks!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: First is 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 does not hit. That's with advantage?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck. Second hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second attack, also with advantage. It's for all your attacks now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 does hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a question for you after her turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay nice! 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 points of damage?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he dead? Is he dead yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you strike through with your final strike the blade carves right up the side and like cutting through a large wave it sprays up into the ceiling and restores itself. Jester and Caduceus no longer being whelmed in it. You're still unconscious, your animals are no longer drowning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's think about what's important here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then-- I don't have-- Hold on one second, let me just check something really quickly. Okay that's an action, never mind. Okay, I'd like to back up, if I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, behind this pole so I'm not in range of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. What's his fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finishes your turn Yasha?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So it says no action, when you slay a humanoid you can cause its spirit to rise as a specter that gains three temporary hit points?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that an action, just has you do it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It says no action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then yeah, you can do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Once a long rest. So can I do that for the bodyguard that I just slayed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, hell yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll just reach forward and say: Let none pass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as this dark-- you guys don't see this-- Algar looks to his left as the body of his bodyguard which has been blown in the chest falls over and immediately bleeds out and dies. This darkened shadow begins to tug and drag out of its body. You watch as this spectral ghost that has faint barnacles and elements of dripping sea foam and thick ocean water drooling out of its jaw emerges and stands over going (sinister breathing).

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, that's awesome!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I didn't know it was going to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Algar right now is-- If it wasn't so generally wet in the chamber, you could see the puddle forming under him. He is bludgeoned, beaten, slimed within an inch of his life and is looking at the specter, looking at you and is like, (fearful noises).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do not move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For his turn, he is going to cower. He is just going to put his hands up and try and drag and put his back against the wall and is just sputtering, unable to make a word. That brings us to Caleb's turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could you clarify a rule for me, because I've never tried to do this as a new magic user, newish, but to do a bonus action first-level spell, could that be done in addition to a second? Or a third? I know there's a version of being able to cast two spells at once if one's lower than the other but I can't remember what it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a spell of first-level or higher, and a cantrip.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And a cantrip. Okay, so forget that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a feat you can take at level eight to do what you did in the last campaign.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not interested. So Caleb pushes up, and if we're in difficult terrain, what, can I move like five feet or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move, I'll say two squares.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two squares. Uh... I can't see shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (high-pitched) Come back to the water park.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Action Park! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's good. Wow. Deep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to move-- I'm going to press right up behind Jester-- right here. What I'm hoping to do is to pull out the same batshit and sulphur and rub it in my hands really quick and then set my hands down on her shoulders to help me aim and careen a Fireball to hit-- there's no wall there because it's invisible, but to hit the ceiling above-- can't reach. Hit the ceiling here, so I can go bip bip bip to him, but hopefully nobody else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To there, you mean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. From the ceiling down to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Back corner of the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Back corner of the room here, you mean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, you can do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn into the fetal position to cower and cover.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Fucking True Lies. (explosion)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 for his dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think I'm at 16. Let me just double-check. Okay, yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll damage. He takes half damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (counting) Okay, so ten points of fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (explosion) As the flames subside and pull back, the evaporated water in the vicinity turns into this cloud of mist that (hisses) around. Steam fills the upper chamber for a minute. And as the steam pulls away from Zsundie, barely scathed by the Fireball, (growls) just glaring right at you, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, Frumpkin is going to go five, ten, 15, 20. Like that. Underwater.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. That ends your turn? Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we fighting this thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I don't want to, though! I'm going to-- you're still unconscious, though--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm still unconscious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to cast (singsong) Cure Wounds at third level. On Caduceus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singsong) Live at seven p.m.!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right. 18 plus four is 22 points of health.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 22 points of health.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singsong) Then for my bonus action I'm going to swing around with the-- oh, I can see now! But I still can't see anything that's around there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. You can't see what's around there, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's okay! (slurred) Just going to do it again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So make an attack with disadvantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 hits the other bodyguard! Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wa-pang! (gasps)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 12 points of damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (impact) "Argh!" And you watch as two armored feet (boof) on the side. The other armored guard collapses on the other side. Algar's seeing this specter rising, this drowned wraith emerging from one bodyguard, and the other bodyguard (smack) on the ground next to him. Looks up at Fjord, just stepping over and walking towards him in the far corner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to move to where I'm not in a line with these people. I'm going to hop over as far as I can that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wading through the water as you get over. All righty. That ends your turn, Jester. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy. We're not going to-- are we going to fight this thing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is your plan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My plan is to not fight this thing!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then hide.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where am I?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right there. You can stand up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to move that way again, past over here. Around Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Algar? Algar is--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, the Szundie.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's after me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will yell to-- what is it, Szundi?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Szundie.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Szundie? Junji? I will yell to Szundie, we didn't want to hurt you! We respect and fear water! Look, my feet won't even sink into it, I fear it so much! I bow before you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on! Come on, Nott!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! 11! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unmoved, your words fall upon deaf ears as a focused, semi-ethereal water-based elemental entity is steady, his eyes filled with driven command and murder. Anything else you want to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonus action hide!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So he's thinking about it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's thinking about it. Hmm?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonus action hide!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and curl around there. Go ahead and make your stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With advantage. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to Step of the Wind again, to get up. (panting) Double my jump.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunt, whoosh) There.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Run, run, run as much as I can, more with my bonus dash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get about there with your full movement with the half lost from the prone--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then move again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) You're in the chamber now with Fjord. As you round the corner, you see the one recently crushed dwarf; the other has this drowned wraith pulled out of its body, this specter looming over Algar. And you see the back of Fjord standing over Algar who's (panting) on the ground, scooting away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (out of breath) I made it! I'm here! Okay. What do I-- Okay, I'm going to-- I go over to Algar and I do the MMA thing and I put my knee right to his face and I pin him down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He's now pinned against the wall, your knee against the jaw and the chin; he's choking against the pressure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bracelet!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'm going to just full-on grapple him down and hold him for my action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pull his bracelet off!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh oh! Oh, can I pull his bracelet off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eh.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: (meta-gaming pigeon coos)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You had to remember. Make an athletics check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But it was in my head! But it was in my head!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check to grapple.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dammit! It was-- I thought about it five minutes ago and I forgot-- that's good, though. That's good. 19!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he is fully grappled by you and shoved against the wall. That ends your go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That ends my go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is now--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You should just kill him because he's never going to work again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Szundie's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is there to live for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Szundie...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singsong) Szundie, Szundie, Szundie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It makes sense. Szundie's going to go ahead and lower down and see the hobbling Caleb making his way up through the water, and Caduceus--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I haven't even started to get up yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still a five-foot line, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Even if I'm underwater?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're still in the space.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not like a little tiny stream; it's a big (splash). I need you both to make dexterity saving throws. Because you are prone--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm already prone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it doesn't affect your saving throw. So yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19, success!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Success! So that is-- ooh, that's a good roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Half of a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Ooh, that's a good roll." Not what you want to hear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. So that's 12 points of bludgeoning damage to each of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb's out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus is like "Argh!" But you're still holding on at this moment. And it is going to go ahead and appear right next to you, holding this trident, now that apparates in its hand, and it's rearing back to go ahead and start.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (screams)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Caduceus. You're conscious.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do... I'm going to, for an action even before I get up, I'm just going to cast Cure Wounds at a second level on Caleb, if I can just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cure Wounds is a touch, I believe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it a touch? Oh yeah, it is. Do I have a distance one? No, I do not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Healing Word is the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do! I'll do Healing Word.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Healing Word is the best!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll do Healing Word at a second level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, 2d4 plus your wisdom modifier.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It autofills, so that's 13 points of health to you right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right! Grave clerics, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughs) Oh my god! (coughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to turn invisible as my bonus action, and I'm going to get up and start moving away from this mess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will just be visible my next turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So we'll say for purposes of this right now, you get up, turn invisible--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to turn invisible before I get up, but yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah. You turn invisible, get up, and then you want to move--? You can move two squares, we'll say.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There. There, yeah, that'll do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The water's going (splash splash).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep. But there's a lot happening. It's just a (splash) everything's like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look down at Algar and say, I'm only going to say this once. Unless you want to end up like your friend here, I'm going to need that bracelet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's like (choking sounds). He can't do anything. But you can see the bracelet right there on his wrist--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to cut his hand off and take the bracelet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't cut his hand, just take the bracelet!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'll take the bracelet off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, what do you want to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (coos)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to cut his hand off! (cheers)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With being grappled, coup de grace, just go ahead and roll an attack just for the hell of it. With advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With advantage? This will be fine. 17-- that's even better. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a sparking, grinding noise, you all hear echoes as the blade carves across the stones and you watch as a splash of water, it looks almost like a water razor, just (slash) through the area and the hand just falls off onto the ground. The bracelet slips off of his wrist, and he's (muffled screams) and is now screaming against the guttural pressure placed on his throat. In that moment, you watch as Szundie-- the trident goes limp, disappears from his hand. Just gives you a look, turns around and then begins to drift up in the direction of where Algar is. And that's where we're going to end tonight's episode.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Drift up towards us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What does he want to say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll find out next week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe he's coming to thank you! Maybe!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems that somehow you've freed this entity, whatever that means. We'll find out next week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That means that the city's going to be without electricity.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not if I put that fucking slap bracelet on!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you put-- oh, fuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that going to be you? You going to do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. We'll find out next week.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fjord MVP! Fjord! Yes! Yeah, you killed it this week!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was so stressful!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ashley, you coming back next week?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was she ever there, guys?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha will still be there. We're hoping Ashley can Skype in as much as she can, and I'll be NPC-ing Yasha in the interim.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Muscle girls!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys for hanging with us. We ran a little long tonight. Ran a little long tonight, but I wanted to get as much gameplay in with Ashley as possible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was a great game!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never too much Ashley.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
